name: Wild Eclipse
description: Help Pieto traverse dangerous terrain and avoid the natural disasters thrown at him.

name: 50 Tiny Room Escape
description: The game is a mixture of classic room escape and point and click quests.

name: I Want Your Heart
description: This is a platform jumping game. You can experience happiness in it. If the game often flashes back, you can use Windows Compatibility mode to select Windows 7 to run

name: Pokémon: Abstract Version
description:
Pokémon: Abstract Version is a fanmade game using rpgmaker that features a fully open world region with:
- 11 Settlements
- 28 Wild Areas
- 4 Provinces (Tranquill, Strife, Carnage, and Vigor)
- Gyms/Story Events that can be done in any order
- 18 New Pokémon
- 8 New Megas
- New tiles
- Fully Custom UI
- Level scaling
- Difficulty modes
- HM Items that open up new areas
- A full story

name: Anchor Panic
description: In 2085, Taino star was invaded by the alien race "Shogel", and mankind encountered an unprecedented crisis. They wanton destruction, infection, assimilation, parasitism, human civilization is facing unprecedented crisis. The infection of fission bodies, the threat of new humans, the conspiracy of ancient alchemists, a series of problems are intertwined at the same time, where should the fate of mankind go?

name: Jet Eriksen's GBJ Kingdom: 2
description: Return to the kingdom from many years ago, now revamped with more trolls than ever. Can you get past the dangers of the piplups fortified kingdom?

name: Infiltrating Sam's Club
description: Join Mario Mario and Todd the Toad on their journey to infiltrate Sam's Club, all to experience the taste of the elusive rotisserie chicken. Be on the lookout for traps and trolls as you bypass Sam's Club's security - all for the ultimate mission!

name: Bog Man Has Had Enough
description:
Bog Man is tired of the noise up above and is ready to do something about it with the help of his faithful axe and trusty shotgun.
A 10-15 minute long Copper map about ascending from the bog and silencing the evil above.

name: I Wanna Commit Crimes So I Can Go To Prison Then Commit Super Crimes So I Can Go To Super Prison 64
description: Mario is captured and sent to the jail factory, and has to find a way out. Try not to explode!

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Episode 2: Hunting Grounds
description: Experience the exciting universe of The Expanse like never before in Telltale’s latest adventure, The Expanse: A Telltale Series. Follow Cara Gee, who reprises her role as Camina Drummer, and explore the dangerous and uncharted edges of the Belt aboard the the Artemis. From scavenging wrecked ships in a zero-g environment, to surviving a mutiny, to combating fearsome pirates, you make the difficult choices and reveal Camina Drummer’s resolve in this latest Telltale adventure.

name: Ichinichi
description:
This is my second 32-map solo project (remember KINDa.wad?)!
The gameplay is completely vanilla, using limit-removing ports and contains only stock textures and music. The majority of maps are small to medium sized with differing themes and pace.

name: Yume Nikki: Dream Dairy
description: Madotsuki has left her room and gotten a job at a milkshake cafe. A point-and-click game where you must help her make drinks for the customers.

name: To the Core
description:
To The Core is an incremental game about drilling and using the resources from the planets in the solar system, buy upgrades to drill even further and deeper than before!

A solar system awaits you, plenty of planets to choose from to find and drill their resources, however be careful to not waste any fuel if you wish to drill more of that resource.

Travel the expansive solar system to find planets with varying resources,
each planet is stronger than the last so you'll need to gather upgrades.

name: Overwatch 2: Invasion Ultimate Bundle
description: Save the world with the Invasion Ultimate Bundle!

name: Overwatch 2: Invasion Bundle
description: Get started on your mission to save the world with the Overwatch 2: Invasion Bundle!

name: Overwatch 2: Complete Hero Collection
description: New to Overwatch 2? Unlock the full game experience with the Overwatch 2: Complete Hero Collection!

name: Overwatch 2: Hero Collection
description: Jumpstart your hero roster and dominate the battlefield

name: Summer Party Time + Survival Pack Set
description:
We've got a huge collection of games with controls so simple anyone can enjoy!
There are plenty of intuitive and easy-to-play minigames for everyone!
Enjoy finding your new favorite!
Party on with the Summer Party Time and Survival Pack Bundle!

name: Life's Too Short GB
description:
A spooky, charming, homebrew adventure!

In Life's Too Short GB, you take on the role of a celestial problem-solver as you're tasked with repairing a rift between two vampires who have dramatically fallen out and confined themselves to their respective coffins...

You'll need to explore the mansion, meet various spooky characters and solve simple puzzles in order to put the mansion back together and mend the rift in the vampires' relationship!

name: Quake II: Call of the Machine
description: A brand-new Quake II experience from MachineGames consisting of 28 campaign levels and one multiplayer deathmatch map. In the depths of Strogg space lies the Machine, a singularity capable of collapsing the fabric of reality. Fight across time and space to find the Strogg-Maker, destroy it, and change the destiny of man and machine.

name: Pipe Dream
description: This 2D platform game where we manage our little character will make you feel different from the platform games you know!

name: Train Sim World 3: Norfolk Southern Heritage Livery Collection Add-On
description: Celebrate the history of US rail with this stunning mix of Fallen Flag schemes, haul freight in colorful style with the NS Heritage Livery Collection for Train Sim World 3, which depicts 9 liveries carried by a fleet of Norfolk Southern's ES44AC locomotives.

name: Summer Party Time: Survival Pack
description: The Summer Party is getting even bigger! Here come four new minigames! The Survival Pack downloadable content for Summer Party Time has arrived! Keep the party going with these four new minigames!

name: Quake II
description: You are humanity's last hope to stop the Strogg, a hostile alien race waging war against Earth. Play this military sci-fi FPS, now upgraded for modern platforms with improved visuals, new campaign content, online multiplayer/co-op, and more.

name: Beat Survival: Expansion
description: If you enjoy playing Beat Survival in Early Access and want to continue playing with extension map and additional 9 NPC's missions, then please buy this DLC-Expansion In this DLC, the map becomes double size for you or with other player to explore than in Early Access. More stories are more fun.

name: Arcade Archives: Mad Shark
description: Use a variety of power-up items to fight your way through the stages!

name: Alteira
description:
Alteira is a browser-based RPG (role-playing game). In this fantasy world, you have your own character that you gradually improve, fight against enemies - alone or alongside your comrades, complete daily quests and go through a story that will accompany you throughout the game. The game is played directly in a web browser, so there is no need to download or install anything, only a device with an internet connection and a web browser (for example, a computer, tablet or smartphone) is required.

The game is currently available only in Czech language.

name: Female Nation Takeover: josei Kokka Nottori Keikaku - Touzoku no Ore ga Ou ni naru
description: In a country where women hold all the power, a bandit aspires to take the crown.

name: Puzzillion
description: A logic puzzles 3D first person game. Move things around, toggle switches, open doors, blend colors - train your brain solving challenge after challenge. Includes classic puzzles and new puzzles, physics and logic, light and electricity, twists and surprises.

name: Emme Saves the Galaxy
description: Join Emme the dog as she battles block invaders in this puzzle action game. Defeat all kinds of unpredictable blocks across hundreds of levels.

name: World Spin
description: Simple and satisfying! Unwind your mind with this new brain training puzzle action game!

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Prehistoric Marine Species Pack
description: Plunge into the ancient depths and discover four new marine species with Jurassic World Evolution 2: Prehistoric Marine Species Pack.

name: The Creature Zone VR: Nightfall
description: Eddy Miles Is Sent On A Mission By The Creature Zone Department Of Science, Where He Will Travel Back To The Locations And Times Of 3 Infamous Incidents, The First Terry's Pizzeria Murder, The Extraterrestrial Massacre On Camp Clearwater, And The Death Of A Kid In The Vents Of Terry's Pizzeria.

name: The Shrouded Parchments
description: Arise, lowly foreigner, and embark on an epic quest! Unravel the mysteries of this fantasy world, slay the monster that threatens to crumble it, and save it from its own destruction. Or, if you're feeling more ambitious, profit from its collapse.

name: Marble Magicks
description: In this Game your goal is to place 3 marbles of the same color next to each other, by taking a marble from the top depot and letting them fall on the scales below.

name: Climbing Over It with a Spear
description: Climb a mountain with a spear, if you fall, you get up.

name: Exotic Kosmos
description: Invite your friends to an exchange of punches where up to four players can compete in the same arena in search of the glory of being the great champion. Also face the adventure mode where there are numerous mysteries, in a virtual and exotic adventure to the sound of a beautiful soundtrack.

name: It's Puzzles: Wild Nature
description: Unleash your inner explorer and piece together the wonders of wild nature!

name: Backrooms Doors
description: Backrooms Doors - This is an atmospheric first-person horror game. Explore spaces that can't exist in the real world and find your way out before the entities find you.

name: Wyrd Gun
description: A roguelite looter shooter about breeding guns and leveling up to survive hoards of creatures on a strange planet!

name: Overwatch 2: Season 6 - Invasion
description: Introducing Overwatch 2: Invasion, an all-new adventure and the biggest content drop to date! Immerse yourself in the highly anticipated Story Missions, play as a new Support hero, hone your skills with Hero Mastery Missions, take aim at the Firing Range, and group up with friends in an all new Co-op experience.

name: D-100
description: Sin descripción

name: Hirogaru Sky! Precure: Hirogaru! Puzzle Collection
description: Based on the TV anime "Soaring Sky! Pretty Cure". It is a minigame collection of puzzle and table games that anyone can enjoy, such as finding mistakes and jigsaw puzzles.

name: Neptunia GameMaker R:Evolution
description: Hyperdimension Neptunia GameMaker R:Evolution is set during an era where game makers are competing with each other. There were three goddesses of game makers who were defeated in the race to win "market share" of game sales and perished. Will they be branded as "goddesses of failure" and disappear? However, Adult Neptune who travels many dimensions suddenly appears in their world, asked by the three goddesses to become their president in order to revive the fallen game maker.

name: Ortheo's Interdimensional Jam Session
description: Get lost in the musical madness of Ortheo's Interdimensional Jam Session. Groove to unique beats, create custom levels with drag & drop or play-through charting, and share your creations with Steam Workshop support. Experience trippy visuals, challenging gameplay, and endless fun.

name: Wild Legion
description: Wield multiple weapons and magic spells at the same time. Battle Hordes of enemies. gather materials to craft bombs and towers. Unlock synergies to get S-rank attacks. rescue animals to get special boosts. Survive!!!

name: Hakuouki Shinkai: Manyou no Shou
description: A fandisc that brings together a number of spin-off stories and illustrations into one, focusing on stories that were not included in the main story, such as recollections of incidents in "Hakuouki Zuisouroku".

name: Mini Knight's Journey
description: Mini Knight's Journey is a linear action-adventure platformer game about two twin brothers who, with their father, go on a journey to defeat the school bullies! Play as one of the two brothers and face this incredible adventure!

name: BQM: BlockQuest Maker - Remastered
description: Play and create your very own dungeons in BlockQuest Maker: Remastered, a dungeon creator full of all kinds of fun gimmicks!

name: Doll Explorer
description: Doll Explorer is a turn-based strategy game in which players conquer dungeons by combining various actions such as "take one step forward" and "attack in front of player". The adventures of Tia the witch, Doll the magical life form, and Lilith the princess of the demon tribe begin!

name: Cantina Royale
description:
Having both a Free to Play & Play to Earn mechanism, Cantina Royale is an action-packed blockchain game that brings you the best of both the Web2 and Web3 worlds.
This unique combination of Free to Play & Play to Earn allows regular gamers to get started with the game without the high initial costs of buying an NFT while also allowing NFT holders to get passive rewards from the borrowers' earnings.

name: Atlas Fallen
description: Rise from the dust and glide the sands of a timeless land, filled with ancient dangers, mysteries and fragments of the past. Hunt legendary monsters with powerful sand-infused weapons and abilities in spectacular, super-powered combat.

name: Banchou Tactics
description: Banchou Tactics is a strategy turn-based role-playing game in the Japanese Gangster High School.

name: Synthwave Racers
description: Race at hypersonic speeds through retro-inspired courses in Synthwave RacersⓇ, an indie-arcade racing game with melodic 80's-inspired synthwave tracks, and tight percision-based action racing gameplay.

name: Bokura
description: Bokura is a puzzle adventure game for 2 players only. Each player will be two boys who have run away from home, and will work together to overcome the wall and aim for "somewhere far".

name: Stray Gods: The Roleplaying Musical
description: Murder. Gods. Romance. Band practice? Unravel the mystery of the Last Muse’s death in an interactive roleplaying musical where Greek gods live hidden among us. Use your newfound powers of musical persuasion to choose how this wry and moving saga will unfold. How will the curtain fall?

name: Nova Parkour
description: With "Nova Parkour," is an parkour game that challenges players. Developed by IMG Studio "Nova Parkour" redefines the parkour gaming experience, offering an parkour game for players of all skill levels.

name: Overwatch 2
description: Overwatch 2 is a free-to-play shooter featuring 40+ epic heroes, each with game-changing abilities. Choose your hero, group up with your friends and battle across all-new maps and modes in the ultimate team-based shooter.

name: Zombie Soup
description: Zombie Soup is a top-down shooter combined with hack and slash action that follows Ricky, a backpacker who is thrown into an unexpected adventure in an unfamiliar town as he shoots and dodges his way through hordes of bizarre creatures and challenging bosses to save a kidnapped girl!

name: Breaking Box
description: Breaking Box is a 3D sandbox puzzle game with physics-based puzzles.

name: Lifeless Moon
description: During an expedition to the Moon, two astronauts find themselves in a familiar town back on Earth. They soon discover the town is the beginning of a strange and mysterious journey...

name: Return Survival
description: Go back six months before the world was destroyed?! Perhaps this is an opportunity? Or a recurring despair? The Great Plague that struck the earth is a zombie apocalypse. For three years, I persevered to survive dozens of deadly situations in a devastated land. In the end, I was cornered and, trapped among the zombies, died. And... when I opened my eyes again... I went back to that month before the zombie virus broke out in the world! In the next six months, this peaceful world will be destroyed. And only I know that the end is near! Is this the chance that was given to me to survive again in a shattered world?! Six months - is it hope or despair?

name: Dreams of Joy Departed
description: A surreal RPG. A tragedy with turn based combat and a hidden morality system.

name: 17 Bucks: Floor 1
description: 17 Bucks is a Friday Night Funkin' mod centering around internet personas and original characters.

name: Super Mario Galaxy 2 3: Impossible Hak 2
description: 'Super Mario Galaxy 2 3: Impossible Hak 2' is a ROM hack for Super Mario 64, submitted to SimpleFlips' 2023 Troll Hack Competition. It earned second place, below TROLLLAB.

name: Junkfood 2: Summertime Slotter
description: Junkfood 2 is a Boom compatible Speedmapping Community Project held in Meowgi's Pacifist Paradise Discord Server which features 83 newly designed slaughter levels; This time, with a summertime theme! The basic premise was to make "Junk Food" slaughter (BFG spammy, high monster count maps) where not a lot of time is spent deliberating about layout/detailing/fight design and other things that can bog a mapper down. It's just good BFG fun.

name: Zorovan Powerplant
description: A VHS Found Footage Urbex Simulation horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism, focusing on the feeling of providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned military owned soviet era powerplant and the feeling of being stalked by aliens.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 25
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 25 has arrived with this update.

name: Submarine
description:
A port of the 1975 PC-50X Game Submarine, similar type games were also in the arcade and are ports themselves from Electromechanical games.

Choose either the Submarine (Blue) or Destroyer (Green) and attempt to shoot each other with missiles. Submarine can also hit the Escort (Red) ship that is protected by the Destroyer.

Plunging down the controller fires, Push Left / Right for Left and Right movement on screen respectively. Game ends when one side reaches 15 points.

name: Tunnel Vision
description:
Trapped on a sabotaged train speeding toward a tunnel with a bomb, an heiress struggles to stop the train in time. Save the passengers and escape the train car before it's too late. The clock is ticking!

A 2D first-person point-and-click adventure game with nostalgic low-res CGA 4-color graphics.

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - SaGa Pack Vol. 3
description: A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

name: My New Classmate is a Dragon?!
description:
From average guy to wizard-in-training—your life gets flipped upside down after you save the life of a stranger on your way home, and now you’re the master of a dragon girl who has sworn eternal loyalty to you! Things don’t slow down there though, as you soon find out you’re actually a wizard, and you’ve been invited to Deagon Academy to hone your budding magic skills.

You may be new to the world of magic, but with three beautiful classmates cheering you on, how could you fail? The true question is, which one of these girls gets a ‘pass’ from you?

name: D Pistols
description:
D Pistols is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly moving up and down. You goal is to shoot all the enemies that are coming from the sides of the screen. When the enemies reach the middle of the screen they will go up or down depending on your current position. Press a button to change your direction and shoot sideways. Hold a button to charge and shoot in all four directions.

The game is over when any enemy touches you.

name: Bald Man Climbs Up
description: A bald man with a unique weapon attempts to get as high as possible

name: Lusófona Games Collection 2023
description: Lusófona Games Collection 2023 is a selection of four distinct experiences, ranging from puzzle and exploration games to more action oriented ones. These experiences summarise the diverse work produced by our students, during their project based classes while attending the Video Games degree.

name: Cannon Block Ball
description: Knock down blocks from the platform using balls in this physics-based game. Encounter various block types, from explosive bombs to rotating and growing blocks, adding challenge and strategy to the gameplay.

name: All Mighty Tower
description: Build the highest tower in the world. Place the block the right time to not to lose any length of the block.

name: They Linger
description: Navigate the narrow hallways in the darkness to find and rescue Jessica and survive the infinite Labyrinth.

name: Zombikini PinballZ
description: It might be the zombipocalypse but at least the pinball machines still function.

name: Hentai Uni 2
description: Hentai Uni 2 is a sequel to our last year's hit. Luckily, you can still play it with one hand only. In HU2 you'll get to see both old and completely new characters.

name: Wall World: Deep Threat
description: Welcome to Deep Threat, a Wall World story expansion! With it you'll get to explore a remote section of the Wall which holds traces of a distant past. But you will have to fight for answers, and not only with the new types of Zyrex: other inhabitants of the Wall are also not too keen on parting with their secrets.

name: Killing Dreamworks
description: It's a murderous adventure filled with whimsy, grotesque ghosts and high-powered weapons. Find your AI teammates and form a powerful fighting squad. Draw your cards to get powerful props and skills. Collect all kinds of materials and fight against the tide of monsters hunting.

name: Sven: Completely Screwed
description: Play the passionate, immoral ram Sven and try to bring every sheep from the flock to their climax - but don’t get caught by shepherd Lars and his trusty dog Wotan in the process! Spunkier and hotter than ever before!

name: UFO: Unidentified Falling Objects
description: Unidentified Falling Objects is a unique mashup of platforming and puzzle destroying gameplay. Players are dropped into the puzzle where they must dodge the falling obstacles and destroy blocks to make big combos.

name: Shadow of Ether
description: Shadow of Ether is a first person horror game where a man with a spiritual power goes deep into the lower astral plane to banish an archon in a secluded haunted house in a forest.

name: Oblivion Eagle
description: A light-gun game where you shoot and destroy enemies that launch colored attacks. Shoot their blue attacks before they hit the screen's edge, while dodging their red attacks before they hit your crosshair. Shoot blue, dodge red. That's the name of the game.

name: Combat Beans: Total Mayhem
description: Battle online in frantic third person arena-based combat. Customize your bean with unique cosmetics and bully your buddies across multiple game modes.

name: Mondealy
description: Mondealy is about you building relationships and exploring the world. An ordinary guy from an ordinary town on an ordinary day uncovers the secrets of an extraordinary underground kingdom located under his home. Your adventure begins!

name: The Man Came Around
description: The Man Came Around is a point-and-click thriller filled with tough choices. Occida is shaken by mass protests. As the fight between The Many -an activist organization- and the government intensifies, the protesters are faced with brutal repression. Play five citizens trying to leave this mess.

name: 30XX
description: Jump, shoot, and slash your way through 30XX, the roguelike action platformer you can play with a friend! Explore lush, ever-changing worlds that mix precise platforming with fevered combat. Destroy fearsome Guardians. Master unique Powers. Rediscover the thousand years we've lost.

name: SokoCode
description: Sokocode is a programming sokoban "Zach-Like" where you take on the role of an intern at the newest box-centered enterprise, BoxTopic.

name: The Question's Quest of Sin
description: TheQuestion's Quest of Sin is a game made in RPG Maker VX Ace, in which you follow Steam lover, TheQuestion619, on his mission to cop some Steam currency in order to purchase additional crate keys, as he is lacking.

name: Nightfire Open
description:
Nightfire Open (formerly known as Afterburner) is a multiplayer Open-source reboot of James Bond 007: Nightfire on the Xash3D FWGS engine.

The game was originally released in alpha version 0.2 on Mod DB under the name Afterburner on November 27, 2019. Four years later the codebase of the game has moved to a new repository due to the original codebase being tied to the upstream engine's codebase, hence detrimental, and the game renamed to Nightfire Open. On August 8, 2023, v1 was released on Github.

Currently, the latest version is v5 and it was released on March 10, 2024 on Github for both Windows and Linux.

name: Bob and the Alien Fire Flies
description:
The betenticled hedgehoctopus' origin story

Bob, a curious little hedgehog has just stumbled upon a small moonlit glade. Within it he's found some of the most delicious little glowing alien bugs that he has ever tasted. Help Bob eat his fill of these "out of this world" treats. But take care to avoid the sweeping teleport beams and be careful not to let those bugs stay red for too long......

Bob and the alien fire flies is my very first game ever, for any platform anywhere. The inspiration for the game's main character came from a pancake I made once (it really did look like a hedgehog with tentacles). The game written entirely in bAtari BASIC features 3 different game over animations and two hedgehogs. Yes, that's right, you can play alone as Bob or play in two player mode with a friend and control both Bob and Hog as they battle to be the first to eat 20 fire flies.

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Special Episode 0 - In A Dark Past
description: In this hack, you will discover how they ended up having such opposite ideals and objectives starting off from a context where they both were allies and even close friends. The hack will then, of course, connect with the Explorers storyline at its very end, adding up for a great backstory for this two great characters in addition to their contribution to the plot and their beloved Special Episode, which concluded their story beautifully.

name: Snake Clash!
description: Sin descripción

name: Enlisted: Nambu Type 1 Squad
description:
This pack includes:

-Premium Squad for the Japanese forces, consisting of four assault troops and one engineer, armed with Type 1 SMG submachine guns
-300 Gold

name: The King's Wish
description:
It has been a hundred days since your father, the king, passed away. You have spent a hundred days in your high tower with the knight who ended his life, and who has sworn to end yours as well.

It's time to make a choice.

name: The Troll
description: The Troll is a troll rom hack of Super Mario 64 made for SimpleFlips's Troll Competition 2023.

name: Pixel Paint 2: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Task Force 9
description: Get ready for Task Force 9 - the VR game that puts your combat skills to the test. Take down enemies using force or stealth while controlling your AI partner. Use cover, explosives, rappelling, wall breaching, and ambushes to survive. Sharpen your situational awareness in close-quarters combat.

name: Nitro Nation World Tour
description:
Get ready to race across the globe in Nitro Nation World Tour! – an all new car racing and car collection experience made to celebrate car culture. Drive some of the fastest cars in the world in this free to play drag racing game. With officially licensed cars, drag racing will never be the same experience again!
Show off your fleet of exotic cars to your friends, or flaunt your fastest quarter mile with your tuned out ride! Immerse yourself in the complete drag racing experience, with a challenging campaign mode and high-octane PvP gameplay.

name: Saints Row: A Song of Ice & Dust
description: When a crippling ambush decimates the Dustlanders, it's up to fierce rivals Bossonius and Gwendolyn Firebird to join forces and defend The DustFaire from the Frostlanders, paintball by paintball.

name: LCD, Please
description: Passport control in your pocket

name: Apex Legends: Resurrection
description: For almost 300 years, Revenant was under the Syndicate’s thumb with the help of Hammond, and all he wanted was to escape. Now, suddenly, he starts to glitch—someone has launched a new protocol. He finds that he’s able to see enemies low on health, unleash a powerful leap forward, and forge a shroud of shadows around him that blocks incoming damage. But he also knows how to hold a grudge.

name: The King of Fighters XV: Character - Najd
description: "NAJD" can be used in The King of Fighters XV.

name: Knight Cats: Leaves on the Road
description: Welcome to Catstown, a scenic village with beautiful views, quaint cobblestone pathways, and stunning architecture!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 9
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Broforce: Forever
description: The final update offers an improved and expanded campaign with new unlocks, along with six new ultra patriotic bros, four new new democracy-spreading challenge levels, and the ultimate expression of military might – bug fixes!

name: PP
description: This is a "butt" as the protagonist of the breakthrough game Players will take the role of a pink ass in a hurry to go to the toilet. Dodge all kinds of fast food attacks on the way, break through the obstacles and finally reach the toilet!

name: Tragedy Theater
description: Tragedy Theater is an RPG Maker Horror game. You'll get the thrill of being chased by those mascots. Don't get caught. Help your friend, result puzzles and choose the choice that won't make our boy out of his mind.

name: Color Splash: Cats
description: Color Splash: Cats is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable cats and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful cat paintings.

name: labyrinth Trials
description: A game designed with the intend of speed running as the player you must fight monsters and robots and make your way through four stages and defeat all the bosses and make it to the end portal as quickly as possible

name: Neoclip
description: An arcade-like explorative experience about revealing unique De Stijl inspired compositions. Navigate a complicated labyrinth of evolving levels using the shadows of the walls to highlight the obscured regions.

name: Only Down
description: Only Down was made with speed runners in mind. Your skill will be tested. Victories are gained by the inch in this unforgiving puzzle platformer.

name: Save the Settlers
description: This is a tower defense game in which you have to defend a settlement from bloodthirsty creatures.

name: Micro Games: Volume 1
description: Retro 2D collection of 4 micro games

name: Dawn Destiny's Child
description: Dawn Destiny's Child is an RPG turn based storyline game. Players will play the role of tribal leaders, creating different storylines and endings in their interactions with various NPCs. Ultimately, players will learn the truth about gods and humans under the Tree of Life.

name: My Mundane Life Is Threatened by the Tropes of an RPG!!!
description:
You play as Natsuna, a girl who works at a nondescript office doing nondescript work.

Doesn't really matter, that's the boring part! But her daily mundane "life" of a monotonous cycle is interrupted by Slimes, Boss fights, Giant Crabs and more!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Baskerville Manor
description: Baskerville Manor - a home full of mystery and dangers – uses the secret passageways for a sneak attack! This DLC unlocks a Baskerville Manor - map for both 1v1 and 2v2 games with a special "Secret Passages" rule.

name: Lilith Wants to Buy Your Soul
description: Take a personality test with a definitely-not-clingy demon girl.

name: Shotgun Knight
description: Embark on an impossible climb with nothing but yourself and a shotgun to propel yourself upwards while falling losing all your progress countless times.

name: HiveCorp
description: Join the HiveCorp mercenaries in their fight against an onslaught of enemies in this action rogue-lite auto-shooter. Avoid enemies, level up and combine powerful weapons and equipment to survive.

name: Cat's Request
description: Cat's Request is a fantastic point-and-click adventure in which you play as Ash the alien cat and his virtual assistant.

name: NecroNomNomNom: Eldritch Horror Dating
description: Plunge into the depths of sanity and Lovecraftian lore in this Eldritch Horror Dating Visual Novel. Will you find love or madness?

name: Chickenoidz Super Party
description: Chickenoidz Super Party - multiplayer top-down arena shooter for up to 4 players. You can play local or altogether online via Remote Play. Steal the show using an array of incredible weapons, special equipment and even mutations. Smash your opponents to smithereens, rip everything around you.

name: Sword of Convallaria: For This World of Peace
description: Fantasy Tactical RPG revitalizing the beloved Japanese turn-based & pixel art genre. Collect & train a roster of mercenaries, customize your squad, and use your own strategy to save the nation of Iria. Journey through a world of plot twists where every choice you make will reshape your destiny.

name: Shadow of Death 2: Awakening
description:
The sequel to the epic Shadow of Death with over 10 million downloads worldwide.
Shadow of Death 2 continues the story of Maximus - a warrior with a cleansed memory. He wandered in the dark, fighting demons to bring back light to Aurora - the land he once lived and to rescue the ones he once loved. And now, warriors, are you ready to join Maximus in the next chapter of Aurora? Challenge the enemies, and show them what you've got!

name: WrestleQuest
description: In WrestleQuest, players assume the role of a young wrestling hopeful, on his quest to become one of the all-time greats while he powerbombs, slams, and suplexes his way to the top. Inspired by icons like the legendary "Macho Man" Randy Savage, our hero must immerse himself in the world of professional wrestling, which will not only test his athleticism but his will and conscience too.

name: Deathbulge: Battle of the Bands
description: A role-playing game featuring musical themes with an affinity for the sick and righteous. The story revolves around a deadly battle of the bands contest, where entrants can attack and be attacked with music.

name: Korolevskaya Noch
description: "Royal Night" is a Russian visual novel in the horror genre. The story takes place in a remote pioneer camp on the Volga River. The boy Anton, full of hopes to find real friends, goes there, but unwittingly learns about the terrible past of this camp...

name: Sayo-kun no Omajinai
description:
When he was in elementary school, Suzue Masato met Tsutsui Sayo, who was in the next class, at a psychiatric clinic.
Sayo asks Masato to be his friend.
They promise to stay friends forever, and so the two become best friends.
However, after becoming a junior high school student, Sayo becomes addicted to online streaming and starts to get estranged from Masato.
Feeling betrayed, Masato started hating Sayo and posting hateful comments on anonymous message boards, but...

A short BL visual novel.

name: Alchemist
description: "Alchemist" is a free-to-play game available on your browser. You can level up your character and become stronger. You can team up with friends to participate in tournaments, buy and sell items to earn money, create your own nation, raise pets, forge the ultimate weapon, or simply enjoy chatting. In the world of "Alchemist," where adventurers gather, you can become whoever you want to be and find your own unique way to enjoy the adventure.

name: R34Hunch
description: A game heavily inspired by Higher Lower Game but using Rule34 Tags

name: Cats, Coffee, and Love
description:
You’ve always loved cats. That’s why when you come across a stray, your first thought is to take it to the nearby cat café! The workers seem friendly enough, but you soon learn that the business isn’t doing well, and they’re at risk of closing.

You decide to start helping out at the café and quickly you find out that the workers are actually cats themselves! Seeing this to be a brilliant marketing opportunity, the shop is rebranded as a cat boy cafe. Now if only you could get the workers to snuggle up to the customers instead of you. Can you save this failing café and your handsome coworkers?

name: Rotting Jam
description: Rotting Jam is a collection of seven maps created over a period of two weeks for Arcane Dimensions with the theme "Decay and disrepair".

name: AlllCall
description:
This is a mini shmups.
The boss appears when 8 large numbered enemies are defeated.
The stage is cleared when the boss is defeated.
On the way, press the X key when you have money (ALC).
You can buy weapons and restore HP.

name: The Man in the Park 2
description: It's been so long. You've tried to forget, however tonight you must walk through the park again. Now there are two men in the park. Will you help one, or both? Who will you trust?

name: Bomberman Tower
description: A Modernized rogue-lite Bomberman fan game inspired by Pocket Bomberman!

name: Pombero: The Lord of the Night - Reborn
description: Explore the Paraguayan countryside in search of clues to your late mother and survive in a hostile environment filled with myths, rituals, Nazis and black magic.

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 10
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: The Umbrella Ninja
description: Defeat the Evil with your Umbrella!

name: Hana: Spacetime Fantasy
description: Spacetime fantasy adventure game for Playdate

name: Cinderella: Interactive Book
description: Cinderella. Interactive classic stories for all ages.

name: Cats in Heat: Convenience Coworkers
description: Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 catgirls who work under you in a small grocery store - Enjoy comedy and animated sex scenes!

name: Adventure Field Remake
description: A long time ago, in the fabled kingdom of Sarook, a young boy was witness to words of light filling his dreams. An evil aura had consumed and poisoned the Sarook King's soul, and the corruption swayed him to unleash an army of monsters upon his own kingdom. Relive the very start of the legend...

name: Lightracer Spark: Grey and Green
description: Lightracer Spark's first free DLC - Destinating to a tide-locked planet, choosing between Mechanical upgrade or Genetic modification, and finding the way out for the divided High-Skulled Ant civilizations.

name: Red Titans
description: Red Titans is a single player vertical shoot em up, use the resources available to stop the threat, you will have to be very skillful since there are no continues.

name: Void Runner
description: Live the dream of being a parkour runner in a world where clouds are not the limit!! Run, climb, explore the void world and reach the space, but do not fall, The higher you go, the harder it gets .

name: Soluble Dream
description: Soluble Dream is a visual novel for adults only. Venture into a world of passion, temptation and mystery. Starring Jackson Taylor, a brilliant programming student who must make tough decisions while guarding his reputation and struggling with himself.

name: Please Leave a Message
description: Please Leave a Message is a 2D puzzle game where the player finds themselves in the role of delirious man named Schitz Mann, as he crawls through an underground, labyrinthine facility.

name: A Risen Heart
description: Court your favorite characters in this enchanting new dating simulator! Pay attention and make good choices, then maybe you can walk away with the man or woman of your dreams. Good luck!

name: Escape Memoirs: Questionable Side Stories
description: 'Escape Memoirs: Questionable Side Stories' is a humorous co-operative escape room game where you are a henchman who has to make his way through variety of puzzles to make it to a job interview on time. Can you solve all of the puzzles that stand in the way of your employment?

name: Reborn a Zombie!
description: A queer, slice-of-life visual novel about the hardships and joys of a trans girl transformed into a zombie. Follow her new life in a world filled with magic, cute demons and dragons!

name: Within a Dead City
description: A tiny 4X game about managing autonomous heroes as they search for gold and glory inside the cursed capital of a fallen empire. Grow your outpost, place bounties on monsters, and cast spells to save your heroes from their own overconfident decisions.

name: Penny Larceny: Gig Economy Supervillain
description: Join Penny in planning and executing daring heists across the city, and navigate the intricate web of alliances and betrayals that makes up the criminal underworld. With snappy comic book artwork, a swinging soundtrack of electro-jazz and a multiverse-spanning storyline of victories and disasters, Penny Larceny is a must-play for visual novel fans. Are you ready to embark on the heist of a lifetime?

name: Dawnlands
description: Dawnlands is an Open-World Survival Crafting cross-platform game with a massive world and epic lore. A variety of biomes, relics, and puzzles dot the landscape... an ancient land, lain dormant for centuries, is waiting to be awoken. New stories are waiting to be written.

name: Videoverse
description: Take a trip back to the days of the early internet and fan forums, when the video game console "Kinmoku Shark" and its online social network "Videoverse" were still popular...

name: Robotherapy
description: An emotional dark comedy about robots doing therapy. In Robotherapy, you're a robot therapist in a dystopian society that killed all the humans, but is still not happy. Treat patients, meet weird robots and enter their minds. If killing all humans doesn't bring happiness, then what does?

name: Pact of Joy
description: Experience the tragedy of Pact of Joy as you explore the dark corridors of Phorcys Station.

name: Dark and Darker
description: An unforgiving hardcore fantasy FPS dungeon PvPvE adventure. Band together with your friends and use your courage, wits, and cunning to uncover mythical treasures, defeat gruesome monsters, while staying one step ahead of the other devious treasure-hunters.

name: Hammer of Virtue
description: A melee action game with fully destructible levels. Use your hammer for deliberate combat or just smash the environment and hammer the chunks towards your enemies. Interactive environments that creates emergent gameplay and general chaos.

name: Not Enough Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Make A Fun Awesome Boss 3: Friendship Always Best
description: A collaborative boss design contest held by Talkhaus in the Super Mario Bros. X 2 engine and released in 2023.

name: Detective Bass: Fish Out Of Water
description:
There has a murder on a luxurious cruise ship!

As the clever, wise, and handsome Detective Bass you must investigate 8 fish-people to decide who is responsible and put them behind bars.

name: Day: Dream
description: A linear visual novel about memories from long ago, taking place in the distant future.

name: Sonic Adventure DX: Multiplayer Mod
description: A mod for Sonic Adventure DX which adds split screen multiplayer to the game.

name: Nights into Dreams: Pizza Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: Bloody Heck
description: An 8 map WAD with level design inspired by mouldy's Going Down

name: Super Emma
description: Play as Emma through 10 levels and help her on her quest to save Mario.

name: Ball Master Up!
description: Ball Master Up! is an addictive arcade game where you play as a small ball and compete against time and your skills. Your goal is to eat as many bubbles as possible to get the maximum score.

name: Rubido
description: A Chinese checkers / solitaire game with 4 difficulties for Playdate

name: To Have and to Hold
description: A short boys love / yaoi / gay visual novel about a couple of cousins whose paths cross at a family wedding. They both get a little drunk, emotions run high, and things take a surprisingly steamy turn.

name: The Last Sight
description: You started a neighborhood security program, which gradually expanded in size. Over time, it evolved to monitor not only homes but also warehouses, gas stations and various other locations. However, as your program grew, it began attracting the attention of dubious individuals.

name: A Night in Prison
description: You come to your senses in a cell that looks like you are in some kind of prison. It's almost silent, but sometimes there are some sounds.

name: Try to Escape!
description: In "Try to Escape!", you take on the role of a character who is tied to a string like a spider's web.

name: Tower of Fantasy
description:
Embark together on your fantasy adventure!

Set hundreds of years in the future on the distant planet of Aida, the shared open-world MMORPG, anime-infused sci-fi adventure Tower of Fantasy PlayStation, developed by Hotta Studio and Published by Perfect World Games will soon be on PlayStation globally. Players will be able to experience an anime-inspired post-apocalyptic sci-fi art style, freeform character development, and exciting combat through thrilling battles and exciting open-world exploration.

name: Star-Crosst
description: Earth has just survived a decade of war against an invading alien species, and the younger generation has been given an opportunity to restart their lives. Explore a deep, immersive character study set in a futuristic world about relationships, our purpose in life and the paths we make for ourselves

name: Strategist
description:
Life is all about achieving goals and dodging obstacles. In this brainteasing game, you use your mind to determine a path you will engage with your body.
This mind boggling game inspires you to think before you do. Even more so, before thinking about taking action you are encouraged to observe. See what the world around you is doing and learn from it.

name: Green Bakery
description:
You play as the main character, who, going to work, goes to the bakery on the way. There fate confronts you with a baker who loves melodramas and Frank Sinatra. And you, of course.
There are five endings in the game.

name: Binary Star Hero
description:
Binary Star is the country's top Super Hero. His light shines bright against any darkness... but the brighter the light illuminates, the darker the cast shadow becomes.

Discover who Binary Star is behind the mask.

name: Fishing for a God
description:
I come to you, reader, with a warning born of terror and despair. Deep in the heart of a forsaken lake, where the waters run dark and still, lies a twisted game of fate and peril. A fisherman's tale, once filled with dreams of bountiful catch, turned sinister by the unknown.

Catch fish and journey to the enigmatic market, hidden far to the west, shrouded in darkness and secrecy. There, an unworldly buyer awaits, inscrutable and foreboding. Be wary, for the coins that burst forth in the market's belly are no mere trinkets but carry a haunting aura of evil.

Yet, as you brave this treacherous path, beware the malevolence that lurks unseen. For in the shadows of ancient trees, treehuggers skulk, eager to snatch your hard-earned catch and curse you with a darkness that spreads through your very being. My skin, once tanned by the sun, now turns black like theirs, a mark of doom that lingers. We are them.

I implore you, weary traveler, to wield caution and wit, for the lake's dark secrets have claimed countless fishermen before you. Their dreams of riches and glory swallowed whole by the lake's insatiable hunger. Tread lightly, for it thirsts for more souls to claim, entangling its victims in an eternal struggle.

Your journey's end beckons in the shop beyond, far to the east. Procure the enigmatic items it holds, and only then may you dare to hope for liberation - to "release him." But I beg you, heed my warning and break the cycle of this wicked game. Turn back, return to the safety of your home shores, and forsake the haunting allure of this macabre endeavor. Your life, your soul, they are precious, and this game is nothing but a cruel, treacherous ruse.

name: Echoes from the Abyss
description:
"Echoes from the Abyss" is a chilling first-person horror game set in an abandoned military bunker. Unravel the dark secrets hidden within as Maya, the daughter of a former soldier. Embark on a harrowing journey to uncover the truth behind her Father's haunted past. Solve puzzles, make your way through the bunker and confront abominable horrors in a quest for answers that could forever change her life.

The game contains flickering lights, depiction of suicide and blood.

name: Run Witch
description:
Help Dona across 6 levels to go defeat the monster that terrorizes her village.
Run, jump, and cast magic with all your skills in this old school 2D world.
Do it fast and enter the world leaderboard with your best times.

name: Stardust Sinner
description:
Stardust Sinner is a caravan rail shooter that puts you behind the broomstick of ordinary magician Marisa Kirisame!

Take flight and take aim as she raids the Scarlet Devil Mansion!

name: Love: Spice!
description:
Love: Spice! is an otome/dating sim game created in two weeks for My First Game Jam: Summer 2023.

In a world where everybody (yes, everybody) is some kind of spice, a regular black pepper, weighed down by the mundanities of life, engages in an interesting hobby to destress: people -- no, spice watching. In a completely respectful manner, of course. It's always cathartic to see hot men just existing. But at some point, these men have begun to take an interest in our unassuming little black pepper! And maybe, just maybe, it'll develop into something more...

name: Andaron Saga
description: Andaron Saga is a fully-fledged romhack for Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

name: Majukes Tower Defense
description:
You are the Supreme Mage who controls a powerful magic tower. This tower attracts many monsters and monsters who dream of destroying it.

Your task as the Supreme Mage is to protect the tower and prevent it from being destroyed.

name: Lloyd the Monkey: Remastered
description: Lloyd the Monkey: Remastered is a remastered version of the original game with various improvements, released originally for PC in the 2023 edition of Sonic Amateur Games Expo.

name: Blob Command
description: Match blobs together, create chain reactions and don't run out of time!

name: The House
description: You are an 18-year-old Spanish boy called Antonio who one day went shopping, and when he returned home he noticed things that were somewhat strange...

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws Pack: Variety Pack 9
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Grasshoppers!
description: In this simple but challenging arcade game, help Bobby pick up some pumpkins as fast as you can...but watch out for the Grasshoppers!

name: Sex Simulator: Yoga Girls
description: A steamy sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a sexy instructor who helps her clients achieve deeper orgasms through the practice of yoga.

name: Wash Simulator: Clean Garage, House, Cars Business Tycoons
description: Welcome to the ultimate cleaning adventure, where cleanliness is your path to success! In Wash Simulator, you're the savvy entrepreneur, ready to conquer the world of washing and cleaning.

name: Wind Love
description: Visual novel in Japanese style. An exciting story with four endings, a huge number of choices, 10+ CGs, 5+ BGs, original music and animated sprites of the main characters will allow you to immerse yourself in a cruel world of deceit and sincerity..

name: The Forest of Conx
description: The Forest of Conx: A spooky noir styled survival horror tower defense game

name: Puzzle Boys
description: Lots of handsome and muscular men in this puzzle game.

name: Mai and the Legendary Treasure
description: Mai finds a hidden map that brings her to another world. With some newfound friends, Mai sets off to hunt for the legendary treasure! But with rivals in her way, will she finally get her hands on the legendary treasure...?

name: The Scrap
description: The Scrap is an independent third-person shooter that takes place in a futuristic world inhabited by robots.

name: Sex Doll K-Pop Idol
description: Sex Doll K-Pop Idol is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media. The main character wants to become a social media star. In order to publish posts, she needs to get resources in the form of money, fans, and subscribers.

name: Erozld
description: Mio is an adventurer who dived into a dungeon, dreaming of getting rich. She falls into a pit and, battered and bruised, obtains a holy sword called Aphrodite. However, the holy sword is a magical sword with special powers.

name: Kindred
description: Kindred is the first and only book of the Kindred series.

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya DLC 4 Pack: Garden of the Sun & Shining Needle Castle
description: Fourth expansion pack for Mystia Izakaya.

name: Spot The Object
description: Embark on an immersive hidden object quest! Explore stunning landscapes, enjoy relaxing gameplay, and unravel challenging puzzles. Discover the joy of Spot the Object today!

name: Test Test Test
description:
Test Test Test is a retro pixel-art point-and-click puzzle adventure where you must escape a time loop as an overworked office employee.
Find clues, gather information, and solve cryptic puzzles with alternate reality game elements.
Will you be able to release yourself from the clutch of time itself? Or will you be stuck in this reality forever?

name: Skibidi Toilet Killer
description: You are the Cameraman. Go around the map and shoot down the Skibidi Toilets to finish the stage, or else they will defeat you.

name: Background Memory
description: A playable music video featuring Hatsune Miku. Second in the series.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Definitive Edition
description:
Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

Meet the locals and get your tools. Sit down or stand and wait for pike, salmon, and other smaller or bigger fish to swallow the hook. Show everyone your trophies. Catch fish and artifacts with a fishing net or a suitable rod.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Legendary Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Playtime with Percy
description: Playtime with Percy is a traditional-styled FNaF fangame with the primary gameplay structure being revolved around The Pal Percy; a Tamagotchi-like toy. With the core gameplay loop being “Tasked Based / End at Your Own Pace” instead of the classic “Survive from 12AM to 6AM” formula.

name: Mutant Forge
description: Mutant Forge is a free to play real-time-battler. Play through campaign to Forge new mutants, battle in real time with your team against other players, and even create your own levels using our level editor tool.

name: Hentai Girls: Extended Edition
description: These girls want to invite you into the most tempting puzzle game experience Nintendo Switch has to offer.

name: Monster Roadtrip Hitchhiker Pack: The Color Squad
description:
Amira Rashid is a fierce woman who's always ready to take on any challenge.
Oz is a nervous smol bean who's trying his best.
Vicky Schmidt is an energetic dork who's always ready to help other people.
Brian Yu is... just Brian -- and we love him because of it! Such a chill dude.

name: Chainsaw Man: Nusunda Baiku De Kirihiraku!!
description: Chainsaw Man: Nusunda Baiku De Kirihiraku!! is a mobile browser game based on the Chainsaw Man series. The game was made to promote volume 15 of the manga.

name: Apathy: Inaba Hyakumantetsu in Narugami Gakuen Reikaiki
description:
A special feature on the school's Seven Wonders planned by Narukami Gakuen's newspaper club.
However, there are constant rumors that first-year student Shuichi Sakagami, who participated in the project, has gone missing after the meeting of the Seven Wonders.

The truth emerges while listening to the events of the day from Makoto Shindo, Yukihito Ayanokoji, Nozomu Kazama, Akemi Iwashita, and Tomoharu Hosoda, Shoji Arai and Reiko Fukuzawa, the storytellers of the Seven Wonders who participated in the meeting.

Did Shuichi Sakagami really go missing?

name: Ace Antigravity Combat Racing
description: One and Only! Ultimate Antigravity Racing Game!

name: Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip XXL
description:
Monster Roadtrip adds a twist to its predecessors Monster Prom and Monster Camp, multiplayer dating sims brimming with beautiful art and unapologetic humor.

This sequel takes you on an unforgettable road trip along with fan-favorites Scott and Polly. On the way, you will stay at crummy motels, engage in dark cult rituals, help out strangers on the road and pick up more hitchhikers than Scott can count. Bump into old friends and meet plenty of new faces on your way to one of six destinations.

But that’s not all! The XXL version includes ALL of the DLC playable characters: Zoe, Juan, Hazel and Glitch.

name: Idle Zoo Park
description: Upgrade Zoo parks, build new ones and become a tycoon like no other!

name: Rocket Car: Ultimate Ball League Machines
description:
Introducing Rocket Car: Ultimate Ball League Machines — the perfect blend of fast cars and thrilling soccer action!
Choose from a variety of stylish vehicles, each with its own unique abilities. Whether you prefer speedy sports cars or powerful machines, there's a ride for everyone in Rocket Car.

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 8
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Cursed Fables: A Voice to Die For - Collector's Edition
description: Marianna, the sea witch, is investigating a mind-control mystery, but she soon discovers that she may know the culprit personally!

name: Kagitori: Bird in Cage Hiding the Key
description: Kagitori: Bird in Cage Hiding the Key is the western release of the mystery visual novel where the main character and four heroines who live in a mansion work together to solve a murder that took place in their town.

name: Dino Run
description:
Roarrr! Welcome to the epic world of "Dino Run", where an unruly dinosaur is on the loose and won't stop for anything or anyone. Join our hilarious dino as he races through a prehistoric playground, dodging walls, fences and even crossing bridges like a boss!

You must watch out for those tricky corners! Make sure you turn correctly or face extinction! And what's more fun than demolishing obstacles? Smash those stone walls to pieces, not with your head (silly dinosaur!), but with mighty meteor showers! Take that, you pesky walls!

Devour delicious burgers along the way, run carefully and watch out for water, a dino can't swim (who knew?) Let's keep our dinosaur dry, shall we?

Are you ready for this wild dinosaur adventure? The fun is endless, just like our dino's world!

Go ahead, let's run like a dinosaur to victory! Rawrr!

name: Cooking Arena: Breakfast Bar Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen?

In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task!

You will take on the role of a breakfast bar manager and try your best to serve the hordes of hungry customers as quickly as possible.

name: Cooking Arena: Salad Bar Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to manage this awesome salad bar which will soon become the best one in town!

Be careful not to mix up your recipes!

Upgrade your bar and make it beautiful! Find ingredients of the best quality!

name: Cooking Arena: Sushi Time!
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to manage a sushi bar!

Try to deliver the orders on time, but be careful not to mix them up!

Upgrade your bar and beautify it, so that you'll be able to create the best sushi in town!

name: Cooking Arena: Pancake Bar Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to work in this pancake bar which will soon become the best one in town!

Scoop up some pancake batter and drizzle it on a frying pan. Watch as it turns golden brown.

Add some ingredients – syrup, fruit, whipping cream... Don't forget a thing!

name: Cooking Arena: Pizza Bar Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to work in this pizzeria which will soon become the best one in town!

Well... at least that's your plan.

The clients are already standing in line, and you have to serve them as soon as you can. It's harder than it sounds though!

name: Cooking Arena: Burger Chef Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to explore burger joint from the other side!
Not everyone can, so don't waste the opportunity!

Manage the preparation of burgers, french fries, crispy chicken and a multitude of other treats!

Try to deliver the orders on time, but be careful not to mix them up!

name: Cooking Arena: Sweet Bakery Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits and decorations.

Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels.

Personalize your interior with countless upgrades.

name: Cooking Arena: Food Truck Tycoon Asian Cuisine
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to explore Asian Food and become the best gourmet cooking master at your brand-new food truck!

Take orders, make delicious dishes and be fast to serve the hordes of hungry customers who will queue in front of your counter!

Be careful not to burn the food!

name: Outlanders: Life of Yolotli
description: Deep within the dense jungle lands of the Outlands, a girl is born. As she grows up in a world of power-hungry leaders and reckless habits, she will learn valuable lessons about the intricate cycle of life and nature, the cost of unrestrained ambition, and, most importantly, herself.

name: Hexlords: Quantum Warfare
description:
This was a world made out from the best intentions. The year is 2020 and tensions have reached critical mass between the four major factions of the world - The United, The Guards, Modernists, and Zealots. Having enjoyed peace and world-wide social and economic freedom since the end of World War II, the United Democratic Government has finally collapsed due to increasing pressure from radicals to reintroduce borders and independence between countries. This has given rise to underground warlords wishing to take advantage of this situation be it from a moral standpoint or for pure profit.

Do you believe in absolute independence like the Zealots or do you trust in the powers of a United government? Choose a side or play the field to build the ultimate force.

name: The Voices Stories
description: A collection of 5 short stories written by Matthew Green about 20 years ago

name: Shin Galaxy: Engage
description: Shin Galaxy: Engage is an action game with RPG elements in a top-down perspective, where you control spaceships and tries to survive as much as possible in the stages. Improve performance, change appearance and unlock new ships to get as far as you can.

name: Survivors of the Plague
description: Survive against the Scarlet Plague in an action-packed survival roguelike.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Medieval Mayhem
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Medieval themed tables filled with cannons that will blast you to the past!

name: Cooking Arena
description: Universe bursting with flavors and culinary adventures awaits!

name: Eroblast: Playful Edition
description: You'll be able to chat with attractive girls, know their engaging storylines, receive spicy pictures, and solve Match-3 Puzzles to unlock new and cool pick-up lines for your waifu!

name: Lunia Z:Revival
description: Lunia Z is an "Action Arcade" MMORPG. This translates to being a more action-oriented game, where you directly control your character and its actions, combining attacks you can create using the keyboard keys. It feels like watching an animated film with a powerful 3D impact and presentation.

name: Sym.Bios: Torn Asunder
description: Sym.Bios: Torn Asunder is a text-based visual novel with tricky moral choices and beautiful art. Its epic sci-fi story is told through vivid dialogue, featuring 7 main characters. All your decisions will have consequences down the line: will you succeed in your mission?

name: CSOL
description: This is a multiplayer online cooperative combat shooting game, the game players can experience the real shootout shooting pleasure, together to play a shootout.

name: Single Malt Apocalypse
description: Not everything is fine in the small mining town of Cinderbrook. Your task is to find out what on earth is happening in the shadows of the town! Solve the mystery in this old-school adventure game with RPG influences!

name: Plong
description: Roguelike brick-breaking arcade game. Wreak havoc as a rogue virus in the distant year of 1998.

name: Police Car Escape Simulator
description: Are you ready for the multi-directional chase of the cops? Experience an adrenaline-filled police game with Police Car Escape Simulator. Escape, crash and beat the cops in fast vehicles!

name: Mansion Mystery
description: Dive into 'Mansion Mystery,' an immersive VR puzzler. In a haunted mansion governed by real-world physics, ignite matches, shatter plates, solve intricate puzzles. Will you unravel the secrets and escape or be trapped forever?

name: Mixing Ammos
description:
A turn-based strategy game.
Use the skills to attack (or being counter-attacked by) the enemies, and defeat the boss.

Control Ely, Astra, and Jennifer to hunt down their long-term frienemy - Exo, uncover the traitor - Dreyar, and defeat the ultimate Exo - red.

name: Biscuitts 5
description: Biscuitts 5 is a First Person Shooter game.

name: Pilfer: Story of Light
description: A 3D platforming journey featuring a cute raccoon that must save the forest from darkness! Master dozens of different level mechanics as you run and jump through course-based worlds, saving other animals along the way.

name: Greedland
description: Welcome to Greedland, an exhilarating top-down shooter where you play as an interstellar mercenary. Battle through ever-changing environments and annihilate waves of enemies. If you enjoy the action-packed gameplay of Crimsonland and Vampire Survivors, Greedland is the perfect game for you!

name: Aery: Heaven & Hell
description: Discover the passions and fears of the human race as a flying god-like creature.

name: VR Skater
description: A skateboarding game designed from the ground up for virtual reality. VR Skater is a highly immersive street skateboarding game. It's a finely tuned mix between arcade and simulation.

name: Sclash
description:
Sclash is a plug’n-play 2D samurai fighting game full of tension where one hit is enough to kill.
Play as a hand-drawn samurai in beautiful painted settings and fight your opponent in epic solemn duels where each move matters. Manage well your stamina, breath and take your time to land a deadly hit.

name: Super Space Club
description: In Super Space Club, journey alongside a group of anthropomorphic heroes as they set out to be the top-ranked defenders of the galaxy. You'll take on various missions, partake in several space dogfights, and jam out to lo-fi beats in this chill, arcade-style shooter.

name: Minion Masters: Vanguard
description:
The Vanguard DLC is a great +300% value bundle to roll out the heavy machinery! You also get a headstart in the Season Pass!

Includes:
- 5x Siege Imperator Ruby (Legendary card)
- 5x Magnetic Bombs (Supreme card)
- 20x A.I.M Bot
- 40x S1ege Br3aker
- 40x M0nitor Gn4ts
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Assume control of the Outland invasion force. Use the heavy Siege Imperator Ruby and its smaller S1ege Br3eaker cousin to pave the way for your M0nitor Gn4ts and Magnetic bombs to wreak havoc! In the meantime, save up Outlander Tech by playing Outlander cards to empower your A.I.M Bot to be a force to be reckoned with.

With this DLC, you have the perfect kit to start your galactic conquest!

name: Cat Trip
description: Our cute cats have lost their treasures and need you to recover them. It's a magical world of cats and picturesque lands with unique sights. Help cats find lost items in Ice World, Sandtown, and many more places. Enjoy the delightful combination of discovery and destressing.

name: Nightfall Warriors
description:
Nightfall Warriors is a co-op oriented game (but solo mode is also available), where you fight supernatural monsters with your companion.

The uniqueness of it is that you don't need two headsets to play Duo, only one, and a phone/tablet. This can involve your backseat player friends, family, or channel viewers.

You'll have a bunch of weapons, tools and abilities on your journey. Your companion can aid you by exploring the map, getting all the loot, giving you tools and usings their abilities.

Play with your friends or familliy, or anyone in the world to hunt down evil.

name: Baldur's Gate 3: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition upgrade content includes in-game cosmetics, such as a unique custom dice skin to show off to your friends, as well as practical in-game items such as the Mask of the Shapeshifter from Divinity: Original Sin 2.

Listen to the magical music of Borislav Slavov’s Original Soundtrack for Baldur’s Gate 3 or even pick up a pen and play D&D as one of our Origin characters with the handy printable pre-made character sheets. There’s plenty to get stuck into, in and outside of the game.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Saha and Rebirth
description:
Version 6.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Herrscher of Rebirth
• New ELF: Project Bunny
• New Story Chapter XXXIX: Daughters of the Sea
• New Captainverse Event: Before the Endless Dream Ends
• ...and more!

name: Manga de Tantei Mystery
description:
You are the one who will unravel the truth of the case!
The game is an illustration point and click game in which you use your powers of deduction and observation to solve the truth of a cases from manga!

name: Wildwood: A Town Building Game
description: Wildwood is a city building strategy game that is all about expansion. Start from nothing. As you gather resources and progress through the Tech Tree you will unlock new technologies that will help you survive. To reach more valuable resources you will need to expand. Deploy a logistics network of Trains and Wagons to connect your settlement together. As you continue to gather, build, expand, and connect you will be able to turn your surviving settlement into a thriving town.

name: Super Snail
description:
Enter the Snailverse through an unusual idle RPG.
Control a snail summoned from a dystopian future. The Gods, deciding to save this world, have sent you on a mission.
With a divine purpose and what remains of civilization, you journey through the past to take down eight Demon Gods. To defeat their apostles and minions, you must collect a variety of items and explore every inch of the world. You will join hands with many bizarre beings in your quest to save the world.

name: Celebrities Hacked
description: Celebrities Hacked' takes you on a mesmerizing journey that pairs the familiar excitement of classic Qix and Xonix games with an innovative, bold twist. Here, your skills and reflexes are rewarded with a gallery of art that peels back the curtain on some of the most alluring celebrities. As you navigate the game landscape, strategically deploy power-ups, and overcome ticking clock challenges, you unlock the enthralling, unseen layers of the stars' private lives.

name: Strinova
description: Strinova is an anime-style third-person tactical competitive shooter developed by Day 1 Studio. Switch freely between three-dimensional and two-dimensional in this one-of-a-kind shooter experience with a unique tactical shooting system.

name: Mato Anomalies: Digital Shadows
description:
Digital Shadows is the first expansion for Mato Anomalies giving you the opportunity to dive deeper into the game's rich narrative. But this time, from ""the other side"".
Take control of Gram's android companion SkyEye and team up with Mist to explore the virtual dimension of Mato and free it from the digital threats lurking in the dark web.

name: Arcade Archives: Baraduke 2
description:
"Baraduke 2" is an action shooter released by Namco (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1988.
The crablike "Octy" were not fully eliminated from their fortress in the previous title, "Baraduke".
Rely on help from the Paccet you rescued in the last game as you complete your mission to finish off the vicious Octy extraterrestrials!

name: Item Tower
description: "Item Tower" is a unique game that turns the mundane into an exciting challenge. Players build towers by expertly arranging a variety of everyday items - from chairs and bananas to microwaves, washing machines, and statues. The challenge lies in balancing these unpredictable pieces. Stacking up 10 items gives your tower stability, but watch out! Any less and your tower could come crashing down. Stack up 50 items and watch your tower magically disappear, leaving behind your well-earned points. Competition escalates with an online leaderboard, as players from around the world vie to amass the most points in this whimsical, strategic game. Step into "Item Tower" and elevate ordinary objects into extraordinary adventures!

name: American Truck Simulator: W900 Tuning Pack
description: The W900 Tuning Pack features over 500 individual tuning parts, of which most are aftermarket, for both the interior and exterior of the truck cab, giving you a massive range of options to personalize your Kenworth W900 just the way you like it.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Book of Nature
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Goblin Creed: Origins
description: The kingdom is in danger. You must communicate this to your master!

name: Kemco: 50 RPGs Celebratory Bundle
description: Introducing the ultimate RPG bundle in celebration of the 50th title released on Xbox now made available for a limited time featuring 50 full-fledged RPGs!

name: Sliding Rails
description: Lead the TRAIN by sliding the rails. Get the STARs! This game is a sliding puzzle! Slide the rails and lead the train to the goal.

name: Eukarion Tales: Origins
description: A retro-flash, isometric RPG set in a medieval fantasy world. Battle hordes of enemies, upgrade your abilities, and experience a deep, fantasy-filled storyline in a European Middle Age-inspired world!

name: Spell Disk Survivor
description: "Spell Disk Survivor" is one of the game modes in "Spell Disk" where you survive against the endless waves of enemies. Craft overpowering builds using synergizing items and unlock new powers!

name: Canvas of Kings
description: Canvas of Kings is a minimalistic mapmaking tool that focuses on randomness and auto-generated elements on user-definable and interactive paths and plots.

name: Brotato + Space Gladiators Bundle
description:
Enjoy two games from Blobfish with this bundle!

Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a potato wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of aliens. Choose from a variety of traits and items to create unique builds and survive until help arrives.

Ever dreamt of being a space potato? Now’s your chance! Space Gladiators is a 2D hand-drawn roguelite platformer following a bunch of captives fighting their way out of a planet prison. Defeat hordes of aliens in the gladiatorial arenas and earn your freedom!

name: Trapped in the Kanal
description: I got locked in the keep-out area in a waterway The quiet sound of water flow makes me uncomfortable I need get out of here……

name: Would You Like to Run an Idol Café? 3
description: Can Sweet Shoreline win the idol competition and save the cafe?

name: Slimeria
description: Welcome to Slimeria, an exciting adventure game set in Middle-earth! your mission is to overcome various challenges and find the golden goblet that will give you the strength to free the villages from the clutches of darkness.

name: Cool Lady
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Kazoe Meshi
description: Have you ever wondered how many grains of rice are in your bowl when you are eating white rice? This game is a very simple game in which all you have to do is count the rice grains in the bowl. You will never have to worry about how many grains of rice are in your bowl again.

name: Free the Lazy Dogs
description: Free the Lazy Dogs is a puzzle video game where you create lines of block shapes, when a line is complete it is removed from the grid and pushes the Dog Warden back.

name: Void Ninja
description: Void Ninja is VR action platformer with gesture based controls and few innovative locomotions. Run, glide, dive and hook. Slice and arrow the enemies. Randomly generated levels. Design your own challenges.

name: Turncoat Chronicle
description: Your father stole his throne, intending to leave it to you. When the long-lost heir resurfaces, will you defend the king—or betray him to his enemies?

name: Alchemy Poipoi SS
description: There was a hero in a certain country in a certain world. One day, the hero was asked by the king to subjugate the demon king and set out on a journey. However, the hero was very weak. Hero-sama who can't even defeat small fish enemies.

name: Vae Victis
description: Vae Victis is a minimalistic turn-based strategy game that is easy to pick up but hard to master. Choose your faction, build your army, and crush your enemies to expand your empire! With clever tactics and strategic maneuvers, lead your army to victory in an epic battle of power and dominance.

name: Cervus Blade
description: Cervus Blade is a 3rd person action adventure game set in a deer-worshiping desert world with challenging hardcore combat.

name: Defense Derby
