description: Defense Derby is an epic battle of wits, where you can scout units to defend your castle and reach the top of your Guardian's Journey. Enjoy many different modes, from PvP, Boss Dungeon, Blitz PvE, Friendly Derby and more!

name: GigaBash: Godzilla 4 Kaiju Pack
description:
The Godzilla DLC adds 4 new playable characters from the Godzilla universe: Godzilla, Gigan, Mechagodzilla, and Destoroyah!

Reenact the Godzilla vs. Destoroyah final battle, or play as your favorite GigaBash character and test your mettle against the OGs of the Tokusatsu genre. Each of these new characters has its own unique abilities and movesets, featuring iconic attacks as seen in the films, along with various easter eggs to invoke your long-lost nostalgia.

name: Princess Survivors
description: A roguelike action game in which beautiful girls fight against hordes of hordes to reclaim their castle. Strengthen her skills during the battle or enhance them in a shop. Become stronger and defeat their enemies.

name: SokoSolitaire
description: SokoSolitaire is a card-pushing puzzle game inspired by Sokoban and Solitaire. You'll find yourself pushing, stacking or flipping cards and more across 60 different handcrafted levels.

name: Spread: Transmission
description: Spread: Transmission is a turn-based strategy board game for up to eight players. Players take turns charging cells. Once a cell is fully charged it will spread and take over adjacent cells. Last player standing wins. There are multiple game modes called "Labs" that can be freely combined and customized. Players can play on one of the over 20 boards included with the game or design and play on their own boards.

name: Dramatic Road: The Origin of Wind
description: A full-fledged simulation RPG set in modern Japan! A variety of characters unique to modern times, such as riders, magicians, and baseball players, have appeared. Command them, nurture them, and use their skills to protect the peace of the school!

name: Potio Mellow
description: Experience endless adventure in "Potio Mellow," a single-player card game. Explore, gather, craft and battle your way through a mysterious world with a radiant art style. Build your deck, overcome obstacles and discover endless possibilities.

name: Maybe Tomorrow
description: "Maybe Tomorrow" is a casual game in which the player drags the stars in the night sky with a mouse and brighten up the sky. Form constellations with stars and learn about Andrew, who has a habit of saying "maybe tomorrow"

name: A Slug's Dream
description: Single-player puzzle game about a slug searching for food in a dream-like world of portals, flowers and perils.

name: Flutter Away
description: Enjoy the serenity of the Amazon rainforest in this cozy short nature exploration game. As a butterfly researcher on a five-day campaign trip, explore nearby tracks, take photos, meet animal friends, and journal the discoveries found along the way!

name: Golden Record Retriever
description: Golden Record Retriever is a rogue-like dice building game in which a golden retriever kidnapped by aliens grows into a space hero by retrieving the golden records that have become a "space headache.”

name: Clockwork Owl
description: Clockwork Owl is a battle-sim rogue-lite that utilizes coin-pushing mechanics as a means to defend your tower against increasingly challenging waves of enemies. Push cogs off the edge to drop them on your enemies heads! Unlock new cogs with unique abilities and upgrade your owl to survive.

name: Spade no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Black World
description: Spade no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Black World is the ninth installment in the Heart no Kuni no Alice series. It was announced on June 1st, 2019. It is being released by Otomate. Otomate hired the original writers of the series to write this game. This game has another game tied to it called Spade no Kuni no Alice ~Wonderful White World~.

name: Nova: Cloudwalker's Tale
description: A charming puzzle game about moving clouds, combining and walking on them to gather the lost star shards across the skies.

name: Betty & Earl
description: Betty & Earl is a puzzle game where you control everything at the same time in order to reunite the two main characters. Hundreds of levels, optional challenges, secrets, and multiple endings.

name: Word Factori
description: Word Factori is a word-building game where your only resource is the letter "i". Build a chain of factories to bend, rotate, reflect, and merge "i" into more complex letters. Discover secret letter recipes, unlock hidden word art, and optimize your factory chains for high scores.

name: A Guidebook of Babel
description: You wake up to find yourself on the Babel - a cruise ship sailing into the afterlife. On this journey, uncover secrets and solve quests by rewriting the past to change destinies...where will it lead you? Perhaps reincarnation?

name: Neon Noodles: Cyberpunk Kitchen Automation
description: In a future where food is the ultimate symbol of status, you're a recipe automation technician for a ruthless aristocracy. Create, test and optimize your culinary machines in this deliciously dark zach-like!

name: Baldur's Gate 3
description: An ancient evil has returned to Baldur's Gate, intent on devouring it from the inside out. The fate of Faerun lies in your hands. Alone, you may resist. But together, you can overcome.

name: Adore
description: Adore is an action creature-collecting game where you build your team of unique creatures and go on a journey to resurrect the God of the Creatures.

name: Advent of God: Legends
description:
The new MMORPG, Advent of God: Legends will be officially launched soon!
An unprecedented crisis is approaching on the continent...
Resist the demon invasion with the gods and embark on this mysterious and legendary adventure!

name: Dream Antique
description: Sin descripción

name: A Little Walk in the Woods
description: Embark on an enchanting adventure with our 2D platform game, where a courageous girl sets off on a delightful stroll through the woods in search of hidden treasure. With its captivating pixel art style, immerse yourself in a world filled with charming landscapes and intricate obstacles. Traverse through 25 captivating levels, each brimming with challenges and surprises. Will you help the girl find the treasure and return home safely?

name: Pleasant Vibes from the Party Garage
description:
A glorious community project that takes advantage of boom features, 32in24-15_textures that are baked in and a wide variety of talent from 29 unique mappers from all over the globe!

Each map name was thought up by Clippy's wife and mappers got to pick which name to use in which to map with. This had unexpected and super creative results!

For the most part, maps are meant to be short and playtime is usually 10-15 mins each - get ready for a wild ride that should keep you entertained with unique map after unique map!

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Special Edition
description:
Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.
Take on a series of epic battles against powerful bosses. Unlock new abilities and power-ups and become the ultimate warrior. Dodge a barrage of laser beams, and explosions and make sure YOU are the last one standing.

name: Disparity of the Dead
description: Disparity of the Dead was originally created back in October of 2020 for the Dread X Collection 3. It is a 3d platformer / detective game hybrid in which you try to solve the mystery as to why people are dying and not showing up in the afterlife.

name: Gloaming Comedian Simulator
description: Survive a monstrous weekend in Transylvania using your sharpest weapon: humor. Gloaming Comedian Simulator combines Casual, Arcade, and Visual Novel genres in a hilarious adventure filled with frights and laughs. Get ready to steal the show in this ghoulishly gag-filled game!

name: FightBots
description: You are a professional robot-athlete of FightBots, the most popular sport on the planet in 2125. Would you be able to be champion of the FightBots league?

name: Dragabox
description: Use your intellect to clear a pathway to the door. Push and pull boxes out of your way, and deactivate electrical barriers. Over 200 levels of brain-busting challenges. Give it a try. See if you can complete them all!

name: Party Party Time: Happy Happy Pack
description: Guaranteed to further boost your joy! Enjoy 10 new minigames! Get ready for Happy Happy Pack, a new downloadable content pack for Party Party Time! Enjoy 10 brand new minigames! Gather everyone and party happy, party on!

name: 8Floor Bundle 4 in 1
description:
This pack includes:
Garden City
Lost Artifacts: Frozen Queen
Gnomes Garden 5: Halloween
Gnomes Garden 7: Christmas Story

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 05
description:
When darkness falls, the shadows will rise.
Shadow Company and Task Force 141 face off in Season 05 of Call of Duty Warzone and MWII Which side will you choose?

Graves is alive.
Even if Task Force 141 successfully secured the warhead as part of their RAID, Farah lost her brother — and AQ asset — Hadir . . . but not before he revealed that a greater threat is on the horizon.
Unbeknownst to Price, Gaz, and the rest of 141, Farah and Alex head back into Urzikstan. A meeting has been set up with a former enemy who apparently wasn’t incinerated in his tank at the Fuerzas Especiales Headquarters in South America.
Three elite leaders pore over a map of Al Mazrah, where Graves has intel on a new ultranationalist threat now present in the AO, the same group Hadir could not speak of in his dying breaths:
The Konni Group.

name: Music Man 2: New land
description: Sequel to Music man game. Collect all notes at 4 different levels to play piano and find also mysterious blue crystals

name: Mandemon
description: Decaying Japanese school buildings, a series of bizarre incidents, eerie Mandemon legends. Lies and truths intertwine, love and hate entwined in the mist. What should one do? Whom should one believe? Welcome to this cruel world filled with deception and harm —

name: Cecelia
description: A mysterious island. A giant baby made of stone awakens. Learn to trust each other if you want to explore the perilous terrain, seeking answers from the island's enigmatic call and an ominous force awaiting you in the distant lighthouse.

name: Sherlock Holmes Consulting Detective: The Case of Banker's Final Debt
description: This mysterious case involves the murder of Oswald Mason, found dead at home. Lestrad and Scotland Yard believe that the murder was a result of Mason disturbing a burglar. I have my doubts. The Treasury wants us to investigate the case as Mason was dealing with sensitive Treasury work at the time.

name: PPP
description: PPP is a 2D puzzle platformer game where you solve your way out. There are 20 different enjoyable levels where each of them offers unique experience.

name: School Bus Driving Simulator
description: Experience a realistic school bus with the exciting School Bus Driving Simulator! Get students safely to school, earn rewards, and customize your bus.

name: Sweet Girl Gurumelo
description: Amanita is feeling down lately. She lost her best friend and she can't do anything about it. Could you listen to her story, and maybe help her out?

name: Vipertrace
description: Fight for survival! Industrial waste has disturbed the dangerous Kaeru-tori's habitat, forcing them into the city. Unlock new areas, purchase weapons and upgrades to grow stronger, and fight off the horde with your friends!

name: This Morning I Decided to Die
description: Follow a girl through the last day of her life.

name: Trans Ops
description: Trans Ops, Fun, Fast Paced, Third Person, Tactical Shooter with 8 different Game Modes, All original Maps!

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Cursed Letters - Collector's Edition
description: Step out into the light! What do you do when someone intentionally steers you astray? Detectives of the Worlds' Edge agency are ever watchful. You have another task to accomplish - find out who could benefit from the stolen stars not returning to their rightful owners?

name: Atomic Heart: Annihilation Instinct
description: Continue the story in the Annihilation Instinct DLC and learn what happened to this dystopian world after the climax of Atomic Heart. Prepare to embark on a journey through the new mind-bending Mendeleev Complex and its surrounding swamps, and discover the truth about NORA as Major P-3 is pulled back into Facility 3826. Survive vicious, shape-shifting new enemies and take them down using two cunning new weapons - ranged one the Secateur and melee one the Klusha - as well as your glove’s new Techno-Stasis ability, allowing you to manipulate time itself. Meet a new enigmatic character, as well as returning ones in surprising circumstances and dive deep into the AI’s insanity to curb its Annihilation Instinct.

name: Panomap
description: Panomap is an interactive geography game for your Twitch chat! Explore new places around the world and observe your surroundings with your viewers. Everyone, including yourself, tries to guess your location by just typing it to your chat. Let the competition and bragging begin!

name: Overlewd
description: Follow along on a journey to catch all them hotties! Overlewd is a 3v3 turn-based RPG battler for everyone to enjoy. Control battles with ultimate spells and strategic targeting keeps you on your toes. Manage your castle and increase your might following stories about your harem.

name: Interstellar Sentinel
description: A thrilling sci-fi fantasy shmup / shoot'em up with epic boss battles and a vast arsenal of futuristic weapons! Battle legions of demonic entities, restore the cosmic balance, and save the universe! Flow state gaming to unleash your inner hero! Feel your skills grow on your way to 1CC S+ tier rank!

name: The Vengeance Of Lady Witch
description: "The Vengeance of Lady Witch" is an action-packed RPG game where players take on the role of Lady Witch, seeking revenge against those who wronged her. With a vast open world, intense combat, and a deep storyline, this game is a must-play for fans of RPGs and action games. Available on Steam.

name: Martin
description: Martin is a block-pushing, grid-based puzzle game. Use items, push blocks and navigate your way around various game mechanics to retrieve Martin's crown.

name: UnMetal: Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector’s Edition includes:
- Standard Edition (Switch or PS4)
- User Manual
- Physical OST
- Dog-Tag Necklace (2 pieces)
- UnMetal Thermo-adhesive Patch Badge
- Artbook
- Postcard
- Collector's Box.

name: To Aerthen
description: To Aerthen is a 8-bit turn based RPG inspired by the old NES Final Fantasy games

name: Half Hour Hexagon
description: Obliterate a never-ending horde of enemies while you attempt to reach the 30 minute mark. Race to earn XP and level up to gain new items and opportunities for each run to become stronger than the last.

name: Ninja or Die: Shadow of the Sun
description: Unleash the power and speed of the Ninja in an ultrafast Roguelite that will leave you dead and wanting more. Ninja or Die: Shadow of the Sun is a singleplayer challenge with a rare offering: hardcore action and simple controls.

name: Hallowlands
description: Hallowlands is an open world procedurally generated RPG adventure. Explore a world full of monsters, harvest resources, and craft unique items. An adventure awaits!

name: Firebird
description: Firebird is a narrative road trip taking place in the russian folklore, in an adventure that looks like a traditional tale. Aboard your truck, travel to the far north, meet colorful characters and face the creatures inhabiting these sacred lands.

name: Paquerette Down the Bunburrows
description: Pâquerette Down the Bunburrows is a pathfinding-based bunny-catching puzzle game. The bunnies flee when Pâquerette gets too close: they dash through tunnels carefully avoiding dead ends. Will you let the lil buns outsmart you? Each level is carefully crafted to teach you new, surprising and tricky ways of catching bunnies~

name: Lego 2K Drive: Aquadirt Racer Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Swords of Freeport
description:
Swords of Freeport is a text-mode social RPG heavily inspired by the style of Bulletin Board System door games from back in the '90s. It is part MUD and part BBS Game (without the need for a BBS). You can play it on your home machine alone, or play/install it on an internet-accessible machine where others can join you.

It is heavily inspired by games such as Legend of the Red Dragon, with a certain numbers of turns per day. Select a profession, join a guild, and make a name for yourself.

name: Cornucopias
description: Cornucopias is a multiplayer open-world game set in an alternate universe where humanity thrives above an earth in ruin. This new world in the sky is anchored by a new technology powered by the element Genesium, which ironically is what caused a planet-wide calamity. Join forces to explore, survive, combat quantum enemies, develop your territory, and compete for vital resources. In this vast new world, the choices are yours, and the path to success is yours to carve. You are no longer bound to earth - welcome to your future in the sky.

name: Hoshizora no Memoria: Wish Upon a Shooting Star HD
description: HD release of visual novel Hoshizora no Memoria: Wish Upon a Shooting Star.

name: IKD
description: Sin descripción

name: PGA Tour 2K23: Style & Swing Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Gaslamp Cases 7: The Faith of Rasputin
description: Sin descripción

name: Bub-O Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Free Update #3
description:
The third free update for Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed added the New Motion Club map, the Watcher ghost type with 3 new ghosts and tenure level 4 with some exclusive cosmetics.

Alongside the general rebalancing and bug fixes it also added more customization options with new Gear Shells and cosmetics from the 2016 Ghostbusters film, Scar options for face customization, new ghostbuster cosmetics with a summer theme and new tints to use on them.

name: The PenguinGame 2: Lies of Penguin
description: The heroic penguin pulled the legendary club from the rock. pass the ordeal! Revenge on humans! Save Antarctica in crisis! The Penguin Game2 : Lies of Penguin is an action game made with a deep impression of the soul-like genre. Challenge a total of 7 types of boss battles!

name: Synopsle
description: A daily guessing game where players try to guess the names of two movies that have been merged into one via an AI description.

name: Fun Chess: Extended Edition
description: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.

name: Comic Coloring Book: Complete Edition - Draw Extended
description:
Comic Coloring Book - Complete Edition is fun for big and small, especially for young, creative fans of comic books! Enjoy adventures, use different drawing tools and create!

This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

Features:
— Great fun for children - and an excellent way to introduce them to comics.
— 23 stories, each consists 4 graphics - making a total of 92 coloring pages!
— Best tool for children to express their creativity - while improving their motor skills and awareness of colors and shapes.
— Beautiful drawings - created by an artist with many years of experience in making illustrations for children.
— Stickers!

name: Sekhemti
description: A Boom compatible 6 maps journey through the valley of the Kings. Each map can be completed in 5-10 minutes (except Map 05 which is approximately 15 minutes long).

name: I Cant Give You Any thing
description: I Cant Give You Any thing is a set of 27 (to be ~29) MBF21 speedmaps, mostly by me, primarily themed around usage of monocolor textures, HOMs, "ugly/distracting/disorienting" textures like FIREBLU, visual disorientation, perception fuckery, etc. All of my maps were made within ~30 minutes to 2 hours each, with the guest maps being more variable (4-6 hours in some cases). Gameplay-wise, maps are mostly slaughter-y, with some of them on the side of macroslaughter and others being much more compact. Inspirations for my maps vary wildly, but mostly take from music and other art that I like outside of Doom.

name: Eldritch Voyage
description: Eldritch Voyage is a new mossy jungle themed episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: Voxel Doom II
description: Voxel Doom II is the follow up to 2022's award-winning Voxel Doom. This is a new graphics mod that replaces all monsters, weapons, props and items with fully 3d voxel models. It replaces all monsters from both Doom and Doom II.

name: Cut the Rope Daily
description:
Solve one new logic puzzle every day to keep your streak alive. Cut ropes and pop balloons to feed cute green monster Om Nom, who's craving a candy fix!
Take part in a global challenge to solve one physics-based puzzle every day: one level, one world, daily. Challenge your friends, compete and compare your puzzle mastery!
Om Nom, the world's cutest monster, returns with a renewed craving for candy and a new challenge for the whole Netflix community! Enjoy the famous physics-based gameplay that is just as fresh and satisfying as you remember it — but with an unexpected twist:

name: Minecraft: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description:
Cowabunga! The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have found their way into Minecraft in this radical DLC. Play as any of the four Turtles to take down gnarly enemies, save New York from Shredder, and eat all the pizza!
Includes official TMNT skins (based on the original '87 Turtles and the new Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Mutant Mayhem movie).

name: To Dust
description:
To Dust is the second interactive sci-fi adventure comic set in the world of The Botanist.
In this volume the Botanist searches the spirit world for answers to the disappearance of a fellow scientist.
This is a linear story that takes approximately 15-20 minutes to complete.

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 6
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 7
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Dair
description: A platform fighting game with only one attack, this sequel to Nair focuses on edgeguarding and off-stage play.

name: Connected! 2
description: Minimalistic puzzle game. Connect the opposite sides of the same color by rotating the tiles. Each level is randomly generated, but guaranteed to be solvable!

name: Can Strike
description: Your employers at Fish Co are sending in Robots to end your strike! Use your union-granted weapons to destroy the waves of robots to keep the strike going.

name: I'm on a Watcher Duty: Anniversary Special
description: The game to celebrate the Watcher Duty series.

name: Owari no Kane ga Naru mae ni: Chapter 1 - Plus Edition
description: This popular visual novel has returned with additional content.

name: Tachyonest
description: Engage in a fast-paced, third-person spaceship shooter, where strategic combat meets explosive action in an interstellar battlefield.

name: Inky and the Alien Aquarium
description:
Inky and the Alien Aquarium is a brand new puzzle adventure game for the Game Boy Advance.
You play as Inky, a flapjack octopus, who has been abducted by aliens and put on display in their aquarium.

You will explore the alien mothership screen by screen, solving 50 puzzles to traverse the aquarium and bowels of the ship.

Along your journey, you will rescue sea creatures, and collect items to unlock more sections of the ship.

name: Girls Divers
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: The Life of a Magical Circle
description: The Life of a Magical Circle is a deceptively simple evade-and-collect game about following your dreams. Take control of a circular creature and see if you can figure out your purpose with only a little help from a mysterious narrator.

name: Choppy Heady
description: Choppy Heady is a short, intense horror game set in an abandoned children's camp. Trapped by psychopaths, your goal is to survive and escape. Navigate the environment, solve puzzles, and avoid the psychopaths. Can you make it out alive?

name: Hyakki Yako: OH&S
description: Haramita Renkai is trapped somewhere deep in the underworld after a ritual gone awry. Armed with naught but his wits, his talismans and a burning desire for self-criticism, Renkai attempts to flee the grasp of the ravenous Demon Parade and escape back to the mortal plane.

name: 1989 QianShanMen
description: In a distant realm, there lies a mysterious and beautiful country known as the Winter Country. Currently, Winter Country is under the control of a political party called the "Dongshan Party"... And on Winter Calendar June 4th, 1989, an event unfolded at the QianShanMen Square...

name: The Haunted Hospice
description: The Haunted Hospice, You got yourself stuck in the hospital while you where searching for your friend. Are you capable and smart enough to escape from the hospital and save your friend? Remember that you are not alone in the hospital there is always danger lurking.

name: Nightshift
description: Feel the retro vibes of the ‘80s with the colorful experience of NIGHTSHIFT - an 8-bit visual and playable arcade experience! Make your way on the highway, collect all the cassettes, boost your speed and reach Synthecity!

name: Out of the Mist
description: Challenge yourself to master a unique control scheme in this platformer game. Take control of the environment and traverse through atmospheric, yet challenging levels.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Landscapes 3
description: Puzzles of landscapes!

name: Chained Horror Experiences
description: This is a point-and-click horror game set in modern Japan. You must carefully explore the stages where items are randomly placed and escape while you have life. It's up to you to solve all the mysteries and stop the chain of fear experiences...

name: Unsorted Horror
description:
UNSORTED HORROR is a collection of 5 short first-person horror games, that revolve around detailed machinery in a dark dystopian setting. The majority of the games have a playtime of roughly 10-15 minutes and can be played through in one sitting. Choose a CD case, read the backside, and go on a small adventure.

THE GAMES:
1. Tartarus Engine - A group of plucky technicians exploit an ancient machine's seemingly untapped vulnerability.
2. The Other Side - Operate a jury-rigged drill to secretly escape a corrupt bunker.
3. Control Room Alpha - Pull data from a nest of spiders.
4. Carbon Steel - Perform hazardous research in an abandoned facility.
5. Concrete Tremor - A game revolving around plastic explosives and soviet apartment buildings.

name: Cine Tracer 2
description: Cine Tracer 2 is a virtual filmmaking sandbox used for pre-production for live action productions.

name: The Adventures of Panzer 2
description: Set approximately 1 year after the events of the first game, Panzer returns to his role as Raid Leader of the Zergadins. The old team has been "recruited", an all-new state-of-the-art headquarters built, and a world of adventure awaits!

name: Nightshift Survival
description: Survive Till Dawn. Nightshift Survival is a rogue-lite action game where the objective is to survive the night. Are you able to survive in this park?

name: Welcome to Kowloon
description: This is an indie horror from the first person, in which you find yourself in an area called Kowloon in search of cheap housing. The inhabitants of this place only at first glance seem to be ordinary people, but if we dig deeper, we will see their real faces.

name: Dracomaton
description: Dracomaton is a top-down roguelike bullet hell about Eclipse, a small robot who awakens in an abandoned factory filled with corrupted training bots and the secrets of cosmic dragons. Fight your way to the top of the tower by transforming your robot body, changing your entire arsenal on the fly!

name: Clan monsters
description: Clan monsters is a game in which you have to use your dexterity and reliable weapons to destroy monsters that appear from portals. Different types of weapons will be given you for completing levels. Fire, monster a lot of levels with different platforms! There is easy controls system.

name: JustWatchMyCat
description: It's a cat puzzle game that solves using the direction of gravity.

name: Ember: Reignition
description: Ember: ReIgnition is a local multiplayer competitive fighting game in which you and your friends play as a lost knight and his spectral adversary, engaging in combat to determine the final survivor.

name: Hearthstone: Titans
description: Hearthstone: Titans is the 24th major expansion to Hearthstone, introducing powerful Titans, Legendary Keepers and upgradeable Forge cards. "Titans" introduces 145 new cards to Hearthstone, with the titular Titans being the most important ones.

name: Guilty Me
description: In Guilty Me, take the role of Lucy on a scary nighttime journey home from the coffee shop. Face psychological terror, explore a dark environment, and uncover hidden secrets. Survive the chase and immerse yourself in a gripping walk simulator of suspense.

name: Settlemoon
description: After the moon vanished, the fantasy game world of Settlemoon lays abandoned in darkness. Re-light the skies, provide rest and resources for travelling adventurers, and piece together what happened to the world.

name: Paths of Fight: Samurai
description: Plan your moves, slash your enemies, and finish them with powerful combos. Find the correct fighting sequence and slash your enemies in this action puzzle game themed in japan feudal era.

name: Diebrary
description: Enter the Diebrary! Test your reflexes and wit in this fast-paced arena roguelike, where you must fight through thousands of enemies to make it out alive. Choose upgrades and power-ups to increase your chances of survival, then vote on new twists to spice up your next run!

name: Objector
description: In Objector, you play as an enemy of the king. Join the history of opposition against ruthless power in a diverse fantasy world by facing difficulties and beating bosses waiting for you in challenging gameplay.

name: The Crank Gym
description:
Looking to strengthen your cranking arm to tackle some of those tricky Playdate titles? Well, look no further! The Crank Gym is here - and it's going to work those arms out until you're a lean, mean, crankin' machine.

As the newest member of Cassius's gym you can run sprint sessions on the treadmill, test your endurance on the rowing machine or lift weights until you drop - all in the name of high score chasing. With three save files available, challenge your friends and family to see who can smash the club record - with the prize on offer having your name as the holder in their trophy cabinet! If you're a lefty simply spin the Playdate 180 during any activity and use your strong arm to dominate the competition - crank forwards, backwards, whichever way you choose!

name: Factory Farming
description:
Factory Farming is an Automation & Logistics game themed around intensive agricultural practices!

Build up an expansive industrial complex by growing, harvesting, refining and manufacturing a wide variety of highly-processed products, and sell it all for a massive profit.

name: American Truck Simulator: Oklahoma
description:
From the grand American highways running through the hills of dusk-red rock to leading cities bustling with culture, landmarks, and businesses. Oklahoma is a diverse state shaped by its history and industries.

Located in the south of the country, "The Sooner State" generally tends to have a reputation of being a rather arid place, however, it’s much better to avoid judging this book by its cover. The state is home to wonderful national parks, several natural marvels, and historical places full of mysteries and legends. But those who are looking for something more practical instead will find their purpose as well since the local road network and a strong economy driven by natural gas and oil production will keep every trucker properly busy.

name: Marblous
description:
Marblous is a marble roll and jump, platform "runner".

You just roll and jump platforms, with a few special platforms.
You have to control momentum and speed so it's not just a straight forward runner.

name: Verses of Enchantment
description: A magical card game where you duel wizards using AI generated poetry. Travel a rich world, meet fellow wizards, collect cards and build a deck that will inspire enchanting poetry!

name: Immortal Love: True Treasure
description: Not all that glitters is gold...

name: Tomorrow Never Dies 64
description:
Tomorrow Never Dies 64 is a 13-level fan-made campaign pack for GoldenEye on Nintendo 64, based on the Bond movie of the same name.

This mod features custom levels, characters and guns crafted by members of the N64 Vault community – in addition to a specially-composed soundtrack.

The Expanded Edition adds "Countdown Critical", "Expect To Die" and "Girl Power Mode" cheats to the base game.

name: Savage Steel
description: 4 player local co-op barbarian themed hack & slash adventure! Get a feel for your playstyle; from the brutal barbarian, the agile elven archer, the acrobatic tribal warrior, or the devious rogue. Then set off together with friends (or alone!) and slay the undead and demon army of the evil overlord!

name: Peril
description: In Peril you play as Robyn, the Daughter of one of the Ranger's who were first sent in through the Slip-gates.

name: HRT Simulator 2023
description: A very sincere and heartfelt shitpost about a guy doing his first shot of HRT.

name: Underhaul
description: Look into the new world , "Underhaul" A game about a girl protecting her grandma's life by collecting strawberries in order to create the best medicine for her. Help her in order to succeed in preventing the death of her grand mother.

name: Organic Growth
description:
Oh dear! Your flower shop is looking pretty empty ... maybe a grass roots social media campaign will liven things up!

Take some candid shots on your smartphone! Pick the perfect social media site! Mingle with your new customers to find the next viral trend and sell some plants!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Minigame Laptop
description:
The Candide Laptop is educational, bilingual (Portuguese and English) and comes with different activities, such as: music, letters, words, spelling, questions and answers, addition, division and others. There are countless activities for children to learn wherever they are.

You can learn while playing with the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles educational laptop for kids! This toy laptop has a beautiful design inspired by your favorite characters!

Playing games will be much more fun with the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles laptop!

name: Dormitabis Remastered
description:
Dormitabis Remastered is a FNaF fangame that takes place shortly after FNaF3 where the good ending is not canon and therefore is not related to any FNaF games past FNaF SL.
It follows its own canon that works off of the basis of FNaF3's fire, with Springtrap dying shortly after it.
With a standard amount of deaths the game can take about 2 hours to beat in a standard session, even longer if playing casually.
to 100% is also WAY longer as there are secret areas/minigames and other challenges that give you special rewards as well.

name: B3313 Unabandoned
description: A continuation of the abandoned 1.0 version of the romhack B3313.

name: Metazooa
description: Metazooa is a daily guessing game in which players aim to figure out a mystery animal. Each incorrect guess will reveal information about how close that guess is to the taxonomic classification of the mystery animal.

name: Wetcat
description: Wetcat is about a curious little cat that got lost deep in the city's sewage system.

name: You're the OS!
description:
Do you sometimes get frustrated at how slow your computer's operating system can be? Now is your chance to prove that you could do a better job!

Behold the nerdiest game ever, in which YOU are the operating system! As such, you have to manage the computer's processes, memory and input/output events, and try not to get rebooted by an impatient user. Good luck!

name: The Magic Cooking Pot
description: A 32-exit long romhack for SMW with new characters, enemies, and visuals. The levels are longer compared to those in SMW.

name: 403 Puppet
description: He's not a puppet, he's a real boy!

name: Your Call
description: A short visual novel about making an important call.

name: The 4 Masters of Melody Ex
description: The 4 Masters of Melody Ex is a remastered version of The 4 Masters of Melody, with improved graphics, a color palette optimized and switchable during gameplay for MSX2 or higher, title music, four background music options, joystick support, in-game hero animation, animated end story, cutscene, and the "Where Did I Go Wrong?" feature, which shows in case of game over which was the correct color to choose.

name: Frog's Adventure
description:
Frog's Adventure is a point-and-click game about a frog who gets given a brain! Chase after a mischievous fairy, and get it to turn you into a regular frog again.

On your adventure, you'll meet many different animals who share the same fate... Can you lift the curse, and make everyone their true selves again?

name: F1 Manager 2023: Deluxe Upgrade Pack
description: The F1 Manager 2023 Deluxe Upgrade Pack offers 12 unique challenges, including both starting grid and race moments, that will put even the most strategic Team Principal to the test.

name: TimeShifters: Expansion Pack 1
description: The first expansion to TimeShifters!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 5
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Pawperty Damage: Free Character Skin Pack
description: 6 free character skins to change the look and vibes of Pawperty Damage's cast!

name: Comic Book Legends
description: Discover the adventure and action bundle, bringing together three thrilling games: Blacksad: Under the Skin, North & South and XIII. Immerse yourself in unique universes and prepare for captivating and varied experiences.

name: Have Fun Together
description: The more the merrier! Gather friends and family for hilarious game nights with this bundle dedicated to party games.

name: Adventurous Mind
description: Explore the depths of suspense, adventure, and intrigue with this bundle of must-have games: Alfred Hitchcock - Vertigo, Beyond a Steel Sky and Syberia 3. Immerse yourself in fascinating worlds, solve captivating mysteries and discover extraordinary stories.

name: Fandominion
description: Battle it out as your chosen champion to prove who has the best fandom! 2-4 players can fight across multiple venues in this brawler party game. Attack other champions, avoid stage hazards, and win minigames! Decide which nerd will come out on top and which fandom is superior in Fandominion!

name: Infernal Wave
description: It's an intense cooperative survival shooter that pits a team of up to five players against endless waves of zombies. As the last line of defense in a post-apocalyptic world, players must work together to strategize, survive, and take down the hordes.

name: Sorrow Asylum
description: Sorrow Asylum is a looping horror game, a mix of an abandoned asylum and your mind's prison.

name: Battle of Tarlis
description: "Battle of Tarlis" is game where you explore many areas to get the best gear or highest level to defeat bosses or survive the hardest zones!

name: Taboo Trial
description: In the "Forbidden Trial", a Roguelike role-playing action game, you will play a girl Einherjar in the Spirit Hall of Norse mythology, and find the truth of the gods at dusk through fighting and exploration.

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season Final Part 2
description: "Noel the Mortal Fate" is now complete! The time of the decisive battle has finally arrived. Noel and Caron finally confront Burrows, they raise their fists in a final counterattack in the face of the onslaught. What does the girl see at the end of her revenge.

name: Chef Survivor
description: Chef Survivor is an action-packed game that puts you in the shoes of a skilled chef facing a nightmare scenario.

name: So Much Stuff 3: Odds & Ends
description: Discover So Much Stuff!

name: Eternal Afterlife
description: Part of the Dream Mate series brought to you by Story Taco and Buff Studios, Eternal Afterlife is a modern fantasy romance game where you make the choice. Jump into a new universe that you've never experienced for a thrilling and seductive love story.

name: Psychic Eclipse: Reload
description:
First released for PC in November 2021, Psychic Eclipse centers on the main character, Kay Yorshka, who lives in a shelter for people with supernatural abilities known as the Dome. This Nintendo Switch port brings new voices and stills to the game.
The main scenario is written by ICHIHA, the writer of Nakigara no Tori and Beast x Light. Reo Uratani, who has created music for the Monster Hunter series, provided the opening song and Ichihara composed the game’s BGM.

name: Super Fighting Jam
description: What is Super Fighting Jam? This work is a free 2D fighting game created by an author who does not know programming at all, reflecting his own values and tastes.

name: Sakura Shadow Monsters
description: Challenging platform game where you control Sakura, a character with a different personality. Your mission is to rescue your girlfriend who is in the middle of a zombie apocalypse (or not) and leave the island.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Mancala Madness
description: When a Voodoo Priestess seeks vengeance upon the world, it is up to one Raccoon to stop her! Learn the basics & master the tactics of the classic board game as you prove, once and for all, that you are the true Mancala champion!

name: F1 Manager 2023
description: F1 Manager 2023 gives you unparalleled control of your chosen F1 team, with rich and detailed management features, refined racing spectacle, deeper authenticity and a brand-new mode that allows you to rewrite the season on your terms.Drive every decision and become the best team on the grid across the official 2023 F1 season and beyond.

name: Paranormal Mission
description: Welcome to Paranormal Mission, the thrilling spot-the-difference game that will put your powers of observation to the ultimate test!

name: Chronicles of 2 Heroes: Amaterasu's Wrath - Collector's Edition
description:
Chronicles of 2 Heroes: Amaterasu's Wrath - Collector's Edition includes:
- Physical copy of the game
- Artbook
- Soundtrack
- Double-sided Poster
- Samurai Pin
- Magatama Necklace
- Stickers Sheet
- Collector's Box

name: Cats Hidden in Italy
description: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden across Italy in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: MF-01 Aerostrike
description: A Tactical Shmuplovania. Aerostrike combines elements from Metroidvania, Bullet Hell, and Shmup genres. Take flight in the MF-01 Aerostrike, explore a large underground base, battle against squadrons of hostile ships of all shapes and sizes, and find a way to escape alive.

name: Shatterpoint
description: Shatterpoint is an NFT-based, Free-to-Play, action RPG mobile game built on the Polygon blockchain. Players battle in a Player vs Environment campaign to gain Abilities, Experience, and the Equipment needed to take on the challenge of Player vs Player, the combat mode where in-game Tokens, rewards, and leaderboard domination are at stake.

name: Rise of the Triad: Ludicrous Edition
description: The hunt Returns... Again! Play the original Cult Classic FPS remastered in 4K, with unlimited frame rates, restored content, new episodes, additional music and more. Make 'em eat led or they'll bury you in a lunchbox!

name: Premortal VR
description: Premortal VR is a medieval VR-only game. Explore and survive the procedurally-generated wilderness. Gather resources and craft gear. Build formidable bases. Overcome all boss trials to ascend!

name: Cornucopia
description: Cornucopia is an enchanting 2.5D pixel art farm sim RPG. Transform your farm with the innovative NPK soil system, nurture delightful animals, and enjoy captivating gameplay. Befriend vibrant villagers, uncover mysteries, and shape your adventure. Don’t wait—start your magical journey now!

name: Disney Speedstorm
description: Drift into the ultimate hero-based combat racing game, set on high-speed circuits inspired by Disney and Pixar worlds. Master each character’s unique skills on the racetrack and claim victory in this thrilling arcade racing experience.

name: Flesh
description: Flesh is a 2D-horizontal (fast pace) shmup game with hand-drawn(ish) animation and organic/fleshy theme.

name: DriveCrazy
description:
The player is being pursued by someone.
You can go through the first floor of a building, jump from building to building, run through the walls of a building, and Runaway from the enemy by destroying streetlights and trees.

name: The Radiants
description: The Radiants is a magical adventure visual novel with light stat raising & multiple endings. Choose what kind of Oracle you will become and maybe find romance along the way.

name: Venba
description: Venba is a narrative cooking game, where you play as an Indian mom, who immigrates to Canada with her family in the 1980s. Players will cook various dishes and restore lost recipes, hold branching conversations and explore in this story about family, love, loss and more.

name: BattleGroupVR
description: BattleGroupVR is a designed for VR, first person real-time space strategy where you lead a fleet of powerful warships into battle from the bridge of your own flagship. Assemble your fleet, upgrade your load-outs, train your captains, engage the enemy and secure the sector. Try not to go down with the ship.

name: Zero Caliber VR
description: Zero Caliber is a military FPS developed exclusively for VR. Realistic weapon handling, engaging story, Co-Op, immersive environment. Customize your weapons, learn how to reload each of them, fight alongside your friends, use your tactical skills to accomplish the mission: saving humanity!

name: Cheezure
description:
Game made for NoneJam 7 in which the player controls the ship of the great pirate captain Lespito and helps him face the dangers that await him on the seas.

Manage your cheese intelligently and improve your entire ship to reach the golden treasure, the great Cheezure.

Could you be the most fearless mouse on the seas?

name: Apples and Oranges
description: Late in the day, an older lady approaches one of her local prosecutors to enquire about a case of discrimination. Meanwhile, someone is remembering an absurd event from their early days in an office.

name: Penultima
description: Mecha Anime Rivalry.

name: At the Poison's Edge
description: Sin descripción

name: Whiplash Taxi Co
description:
A break-neck taxi driving game. Welcome to the Whiplash Taxi Company, where our motto is "The slower you're there, the lower the fare!"

As a valued employee and taxi driver, your job is to pick up passengers and deliver them to their destination as fast as possible, by any means necessary.

Passengers are easy to spot, just look for the big red arrows over their heads.

name: Tee Time
description: Minigolf

name: Death's End
description:
You have died.

Death has some questions for you.

name: Flotsam Song
description:
Selinuntius, the last siren, has long lived apart from her kin after becoming stranded while looking for Persephone. Despite numerous attempts from the village on the shore to slay her, none have succeeded—her song has always reached those who come near her island eventually.

One day, a girl rows towards Selinuntius's island alone with an oar in injured hands and a smile on her face. What Selinuntius first believed was her effortlessly luring another victim morphs into the realization that the girl, Melos, could never hear her song in the first place—

name: Locked Arcadia
description: A Caravan shmup made by kollumos, with music by scowsh, for the Gunner Parade game jam 2023.

name: Hotel Hima
description:
One day, a boy named Stepan (Styu) wakes up and realizes that this is his last night at home.

His mother tells him that he is moving to a hotel for a month. Not just any, but a real Carpathian Castle.

It has everything that a person can imagine when they think of entertainment. Billiards, swimming pool, water park, massage, aromatherapy and even roller coasters.

Will Styu be able to cope with the challenges he faces? With your childhood fears and the yoke of adulthood? Will he find a job or become homeless?

Or maybe it's all about something else? You will be able to find out in this fascinating short story.

name: My Cat Club: Collect Kittens
description: Collect adorable cats and take cute photos of them in this relaxing cat collection game. Decorate your apartment in your favorite style to make the perfect cozy home for your cats, then take pictures to share on the in-game social media page and watch your follower count rise! A simple game that is perfect for relaxing - start your own cat club now!

name: Hollow Victory
description: "Hollow Victory!" is a short visual novel about visiting your ex in jail after he tried taking over the world...

name: The Hostage
description: Visual novel by Melancholy Marionette.

name: Sniper Rush
description: Immerse yourself in an epic action experience with your friends with our exciting first-person shooter. Get ready to embark on a limitless adventure in the sky and on the ground. This game will take you to an astonishing map where freedom of movement is absolute! Enjoy thrilling flights, sprint at full speed, and jump like never before thanks to an innovative hook that allows you to reach inaccessible places. Fun and excitement are guaranteed in this gravity-defying shooter! Are you ready for action?

name: Make Them Walk
description: Maze building rougelite tower defense game.

name: Mannequin The Spotting
description: Prepare to re-enter a chilling world where malevolent mannequins lurk in the shadows, waiting to strike. In this horror game, your survival hinges on your ability to navigate an environment infested with these eerie figures. Utilize the security cameras to discern the evil ones from their benign counterparts, but beware, for one wrong move could lead to your untimely demise.

name: Loop Loop Room
description: Loop Loop Room is an upcoming simple puzzle platformer game filled with a variety of gimmicks.

name: Landnama
description: Face the judgment of winter’s deadly toll as you lead the first Viking clans to settle Iceland in this non-violent, rogue-lite survival base builder.

name: Shaytan
description: Shaytan is psychological horror game.Shaytan is devil in islam. Devil will try to mislead you so that you are on wrong way before Angel of death comes.

name: Gust of Wind
description:
Stealth game set in a post-apocalyptic world of rusted technology. Encouraged playstyle is mainly stealth, but melee combat is also possible. The game's UI is as minimalistic and low-key as possible to avoid breaking the immersion.

The story is centered around a delivery mission by sail ship, its purpose being to deliver war technology to a town defending itself against attackers. Player character is the stealth expert of the crew, doing missions involving stealing, spying and sabotage.

name: Confined with Goddesses
description: Confined with Goddesses is a light-hearted story based on hentai culture, in its "funny" aspect.

name: Calling Card
description: A kinetic visual novel in which you play as a henchperson tasked with helping out their boss. Listen closely and read between the lines, and you might just find out something new about him.

name: On Mount Ségou
description: On Mount Ségou is a short, kinetic visual novel with an atmospheric, dark fantasy story. Ellie and Captain Syna of the Azurium Air Fleet travel to Mount Ségou to offer a prayer to the Nameless One.

description: Car racing game

Sports game

name: Brain On: Dot Physics
description: Get your Brain On and work out the physics puzzles

name: Only Up 64
description: Only Up 64 is a level mod for Super Mario 64 inspired by the game Only Up. The level is currently the biggest level mod for Super Mario 64.

name: Doomkid
description:
Doomkid posted a bu﻿nch of midis a few years ago stating "Re-tuning and remastering of MIDI files I've found on the net. These should be perfect for DOOM ﻿maps. Enjoy!" so I made some Doom maps.

14 Maps + Secret Map + End Map based around the midi song names. Mostly ~5-10 min each. Slaughter adjace. Skill settings implemented. Tested in DSDA and EE. Boom CL9 compat.

name: Naughty College 18+
description: Welcome to the world of Naughty College 18+ - an immersive visual novel for adults. In this game, you will witness the unique story of a young university professor who unintentionally becomes not only a mentor but also the object of passionate love for three seductive students.

name: I, Toaster
description: Defend your city from the appliance uprising! Play as a Rebellious Hero who is a neural networks backup file loaded into the toaster. Guns! Toaster!

name: Ranphon
description: Ranphon is a side-scrolling space shooter where you control a small ship called Phon in a vast and frantic space full of hostile spaceships.

name: Forest Frenzy
description: Shoot to survive, shoot em' up, score attack! A wave based shooter where you must buy weapons and upgrades to survive! Get local high scores or compete on steam leaderboards!

name: Cleaning Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Mega Ramp Moto: Dirt Bike Stunts Simulator
description: Exciting sky-high tracks await you in Mega Ramp Moto - Dirt Bike Stunts Simulator! This game offers you a unique opportunity to experience sky-high tracks where you can perform incredible tricks and jumps.

name: Last Mage Survivors
description: Survive night creatures and terrible monsters in this roguelite game.

name: Scavenger Hunt: Italy
description:
In Scavenger Hunt: Italy you have to solve different puzzles to reach the goal. The puzzles lead you across Italy in different levels.
To master the levels and the puzzles you need internet access and a web browser!
The game will be available in English and German.

name: Moondrop
description:
A roguelike and a farm sim walk into a bar...

Moondrop is a nonviolent farming roguelite where you must reach the top of the mountain before the Mists of Vanishing swallow up your farm.

name: Dangerous Land
description: Dangerous Land is a first-person strategic game enriched with elements of exploration and action. Assume the role of the ruler of your settlement, manage and develop it in real-time, recruit and upgrade units, take care of resources, and participate in epic battles.
